11.content:
You have lived a dull average life. You learned of a condition you had once you were young and as a result you attempted to be as safe as possible. Upon first hearing it you thought your mom was nuts but ironically the next day you got into an accident and awoke a fifth of your regular size.

Because of this you try to be as safe as humanely possible, rarely going out and living life. You were exactly five feet tall, somewhat short but at least you were the size of a person. One day you were enjoying yourself in your room when your mom Monica burst in.

"Luke! I understand that you need to be safe but leave the room once in a while! You have little to no friends and will die alone unless you do something!" Hearing your moms small speech you rolled your eyes, this was a normal topic you and her discussed; you usually won the arguments but something told you that you wouldnt win this one.

As you thought you lost the arguement and was kicked outside to live life. Slightly nervous you began crossing the street and start heading to a friend's house.

Crossing the street you end up in front of a convenience store. Entering this store you buy a drink for your walk and leave. You begin to wander aimlessly, pondering which friend to visit. Despite what your mom believes you actually have a great deal of friends, you simply never visit their houses. Off the top of your head you considered visiting Lilith,Dianne or Ashlei.

Lilith was a black haired goth girl like your sister the difference being she treated you decently, you pray she never does get a chance to see you smaller.Has a pretty good body hidden under layers of g Often she plays around with bugs like ants, stepping on them with her huge boots;each time she stepped on a bug you cringed a little. She knew of your condition and believe's you somewhat, not enough to want to test it but enough to believe it's true.

Dianne had short silvery gray hair, some sort of genetic thing of hers. Really playful girl who loves excersising in every way possible, as far as you know her favorite sport is swimming. Often teases you with her curves. She doesnt really believe you about your condition, hopefully she will never have to.

Last but not least was Ashlei. She is an intelligent asian girl with short black hair. Is a nice person at first glance but she's quite the mischief maker. Pretty cute girl with blue eyes and a voluptous body. She believes you whole heartedly about your condition, possibly enough to even test it.

Soon you decided to go to....
112.title: Which Friend shall you visit?

1121.content:
You walk down the street,Lilith's house not far away.You nervously look around,paranoid of everything."Just calm down!!"You force yourself to,taking deep breathes.In through the nose,out through the mouth.

Finally you step onto the porch of Lilith's house.Ringing the doorbell,the friend in mind opened the door.When you saw her,you cringed,thinking it was Taylor,but her warm smile proved you wrong."Hey,where have you been?"She asked,crossing her arms,but still had that warm smile on her face."In my house....avoiding death and shrinkage."You reply,looking embaressed.

She giggled,and you noticed how her black lipstick lips curled upward when she smiled."Well....it does look like you've shrank a couple inches."She said,measuring herself then you with her hand."Just joking!!"She added once she saw how freaked out you were.

The two of you stepped inside,and walked up the stairs to her room.Goth central here,almost as Gothic as Taylor's,just with a kind atmosphere."So,what have you been up to.....?"You ask,sitting down on the floor.

"Oh....nothing really.Been doing the usual."She replied.Even though you couldn't help it,your eyes wandered to her huge black boots.In your mind,you had an image of Lilith being the size of a mountain,her gigantic boot coming down to crush you.You shuddered.

"Something the matter?"She asked,looking genuine worried.

"No....nothing."

1122.content:
You stepped forward, unsure and uncertain. Your lips touch the cold tin can to let the trickle of coke go down your neck.

Normal people, everywhere. They only have one chance at living, one chance to survive. Yet they think nothing of it. They have no idea what's after death, and you will never know. Prehaps this curse is a blessing? I get to live twice, or four times. Hell, I'd be dead if it wasn't for this curse. But I also know that I have no afterlife. Only hell...

You have pondered over these thoughts, time after time, never answering the main question that fell over your lips.

"Can I die...?" You mutter under your breath as your fingers let the can slide into the bin. You left nothing but a shadow as you walked carefully towards Dianne's house.

"Oh... hello Luke." Dianna's Mother spoke as if she was surprised, a hoover lay gentily in her hand. You cringed at the thought of getting sucked up.
"Is Dianna home?" You asked politely. Your feet shuffled nervously over the stone steps that led to the house.
"No... Dianna's at the swimming pool in town" She softly spoke. You told her my thanks, then walked away with your eyes darting everywhere. Dianna shook her head and closed the door swiftly. The sound of distant hoovering could be heard in the back of your mind.

Your feet slapped down on the cold tiles as you entered the huge room. Water sloshed everywhere, A shudder befell your spine as you this about how you could die so easily. You couldn't swim very well due to never going here, and I don't think doggy paddle counts as swimming.

Your eyes locked on an angelic being that slipped through the water like a fish. Her white hair shone as the water splashed around her without much sound. You blush as you watched her. The clothes seemed to shine there own light as she glided towards you. Her body made a squelch as her bare arms reached the side of the pool. She lifted up her goggles so that they slapped down on her forhead.
"Hey Lu! I thought you couldn't swim..." She smerked at you, "Did you just come to gawk?" You smile shyly,
"No... Mum kicked me out of the house. She thinks that I should get a life, no-matter what my 'condition'" You told her, yet she rolled her eyes,
"Pfft, I havn't seen you lose any height. Your about the same size as normal." Dianna smiled, flicking back her crystal white hair with a smerk, her finger flicked away the hair that seemed to hug her face.

You looked towards th water nervously, your heart rate slowly increasing.
"Can we please get out of here?" you asked, panic laced my voice slightly. She smiled,
"Whats the rush?" Dianna asked, sticking her tongue out and pulling a face as she drifted into the water. "I could stay here all day!" She spoke playfuly. you smiled for a second, letting your guard slip past you.

You lisened to your heart jump as your foot clicked. The rush of water flooded your sences as the hard side of the pool smashed into your head. You felt the blood rush out of you as the water turned red. Your lungs gasped for air, yet only recived water. You cried silently as darkness filled your vision.
"I don't want to die!" You gasped as you slowly passed out in the flurry of water.

"Luke!"You heared a voice cry. "Don't die on me!" Tears fell over your body as Dianna pressed on your chest, "Don't die!" Your vision blurred out slowly to her words. "Please!" You listened to the tears fall as her mouth locked around yours, pumping air into your dieing lungs. "Don't.. die..." Her voice seemed to fade away. "Please..." Her voice, along with the chatter, died away.

My eyes creaked open to a gentile touch. I felt a cold hand fall over my forhead as I looked a Dianna's face.
"Jesus... know I know why you stay inside all the time..." She spoke softly, her fingers traced my cheek. "I was afraid we had lost you..." She smiled weakly at me. My heart thudded.
"What would you do if I died?" I asked softly.
"I'm not sure... I couldn't think... or breath..." She muttered softly. I shut my eyes slightly.
"I won't die..." I told her, coxing out a weak smile again, "I promise..." I told her.
"Still going on about that, hm? You'd better get some rest..." She moved the covers over me and walked towards the door of her room. I saw her glance at me as she turned out the light. "Night" she told me with a smile.

My eyes swiftly closed.

My nightmares sweeped my sole through the night.

Some very tall woman knocked me on the left shoulder, which caused me to lose my balance. Just then, to me anyway, everything was in slow motion as I fell backwards down the stairs. I saw Lilith and Cally turned to look back and rushed to the edge of the top of the stairs.

I felt every hit my body went through as I fell to the bottom of the stairs. I couldn't move my body, my eyes stuck at the top of the stairs. I saw Lilith and Cally rushing down to be with me. I could hear the voices of those around me, one of them was a woman's voice saying, "Phone the ambulance...someone!"

My eyes slowly moved towards the one that spoke and saw that it was the same very tall woman that accidenty knocked me down the stairs. I don't know if I can see right or not but I could have sworn that the very tall woman had an evil grin smiled across her face. I saw her kneeling down right before me as darkness grew around me.

I don't know how long it has been since I died from all down the stairs but I woke up with my eyes closed. I could hear the voices around me. The voices are those that I never heard before.

"Strange...any normal person would have died when falling down the stairs with their neck broken upon impact" spoke a woman's voice. I could hear the sound of high heels walking around me. "This young man is very lucky to be alive" said another woman's voice. "What of the clothes he worn?" asked the first woman. "They're right here, but its strange" said the second woman.

"What's strange?" asked the first woman. "Why would this young man be wearing such big clothes" answered the second woman. "Big clothes...what are you talking about?" asked the first woman. "I took his height and well...he's four foot five and his clothes are for those that are five foot" answered the second woman.

"Hmm...that is strange. Why would a young man be wearing clothes that are five inches too big" said the first woman. Just then I hear the sound of high heels walking near me. I could feel the eyes of these woman looking at me. "Okay you two...I take it from here" spoke a third woman that has just entered the room. "As you wish" said the first woman as she and the second left.

I slowly opened my eyes and saw my family doctor, Jessica Reeds standing by the door. "Welcome back from dead" said Jessica as she smiled at me as she walked towards the bed that I'm in.

'Jessica Reeds (28) The family doctor. Jessica knows full well about Luke's condition and has kept it hidden from her fellow workers to keep Luke living a normal life. She is the tallest woman Luke has met, by far. She has long blond hair and very bright blue eyes'

Just in case, here" answered Allison as she handed me a card with a telephone number.

There was a knock on the door and in came...

112231211111.content:
My family.

With that I sat sat there on the bed listening to my family talking about as to what they should do about me. Alexis left the room and came after an hour with bags filled with clothes that would fit me. As I got my new smaller clothes on, with the blessing from Jessica, I went home.

"Come on little brother" said Alexis as she rubbed my head. "Come on what?" I asked as I looked up at her. "You have to do your chores silly" answered Alexis as she walked into the messy carpet living room. "Huh?" was all I could say. "Come on now, you didn't think that because you've died twice you can slack off?" said Alexis as she smiled at me as she walked off.

I hanged my head as I just went off to hoover the carpet, with Taylor being of no help as she kept on saying I missed a spot or making more mess for me to clean up. God really, I would have thought that the family would feel sorry for me but no...anyway after a hard day at cleaning the living room, I crashed on my bed and fell asleep.

I woke up by the sound of my alarm clock,

Still tired I made my way to turn the alarm clock and then I suddenly remembered what day it and I was dreading it...

It was Monday...

so that means School's open...

oh man...

I got dressed and headed downstairs. "have fun at school" said mom as she waved goodbye as I forced out of the house by my sisters. As we were walking down the street, we bumped into Dianna whom was surprised to see me even more smaller. "See you two later" said Alexis as she and Taylor walked off ahead.

"How do you want get to?" asked Dianna as she smiled down at me. I looked at her and answered,
112231211111.title: Monica, Alexis and Taylor

choices: Hang out on the school grounds
1122312111111.content:
"We catch the bus to school"

"Are you sure?" asked Dianna as she looked at me worried. "Yeah, its better than having to walk to school" I answered as the two of us headed towards the bus stop. We stood there, waiting for the bus for only twenty minutes, during that time I saw many people that I knew from school. Lucky for me they didn't even looked at me as they walked past us.

As the bus came, the two of us entered, paid and sat down near the back where no one would look me. The bus began to take off and during the trip, I felt sick in the stomach as I feared what the school life would be like when I'm four foot five tall.

As the bus was drawing nearer to the school, the bus stopped to pick up students, I looked forward and saw that two of my friends got on. It was Lilith and Ashlei, they looked and saw me next to Dianna.

"Hay I heard what happen during the weekend" said Ashlei as she and Lilith sat down in the seats in front of us. I looked up and looked at Ashlei and noticed that she looked at me funny. "You know...you look different" said Ashlei. "I'm still the same...but only..." I said as the bus palled over. "Last stop" said the bus driver.

With that everyone including me got off the bus and headed towards the school grounds.
1122312111111.title: We catch the school bus

choices: Head off to the next lesson
11223121111111.content:
The moment we set foot onto school grounds, the school bell rang. I walked towards the building with my head low hoping that no one would be able to tell that it was me. I had Dianna, Lilith and Ashlei walking beiside me. I noticed that Ashlei kept on looking at me as if she was enjoying me being smaller and I hop that's all in mind.

We all enter the form room and waited five minutes before our form totour came in which she goes by the name of Melanie Silverman. As I was sitting, I couldn't help but feel the eyes of the other students looking at and I could hear whispers of them saying that I looked somewhat smaller. I tried not to think much of it as Miss Silverman called out our names.

After that was done, we all pretty much just sat there waiting for the first class to begin. As I looked at the clock as it was ticking, a fellow student, a tall blond teen that goes by the name of Tracy Cray. I looked up and saw here standing there looking down at me, she order me to stand up. I took a deep breath and did what I was told.

"Oh my Luke...tell me...why are you small?" asked Tracy as she looked down her nose at me. I noticed that the other student looked at me with a smile on their faces. Before I could answer, the bell rang and I dashed out of the form room like a bullet. I could hear Tracy laughing along with other students.

As I was about to enter my first lesson which was Maths, I noticed that I left my bag back at the form room, as I was about to head back, Ashlei walked up to me with my bag in hand. She smiled down at me and said, "You forgot this" "Thanks" I said as I took the bag and entered the room with Ashlei following behind as she has the same lesson as me.

*Melanie Silverman* (30)
Melanie teaches English but is also Luke's form toutor. She is a very tall woman and after she learns about Luke being 4'5 tall, she tends to try help him out any way she can/

*Tracy Cray* (17)
Tracy is the popular girl of Luke's form. After she noticed him being smaller, she tries her best to find out why to Luke's dismay.
11223121111111.title: School Bell Rings

choices: Cris, right in front of everyone bursts out "Did you get smaller?"
No one says anything...but later Lakin pulls you aside and confronts you.
11223121111112.content:
Classes wouldn't start for a good thirty minutes, so you and your gang decided to hang out around school grounds. Mess around; greet some friends, teenager stuff. Normally you'd have loved to, but with the recent loss of seven inches you weren't exactly comfortable, especially seeing everyone on a larger scale. Twas...a bit intimidating, but you managed to pull off acting like nothing was wrong. Ashlei and the rest of the group seemed to forget my height difference, even Dianna didn’t notice I shrunk again; God bless teenage ignorance.

No one at school seemed to notice anything either, they probably associated any differences with hair or something, no one even paid you a hint of mind. It was relieving, and soon you were comfortable enough to act normally. Things wouldn’t get bad, no one noticed a thing. That was when an oncoming group caught your attention. It wasn’t a group you hated or anything…in fact quite the contrary; they were more of your dear friends.

The group was of four girls, each of them pretty cute and easy on the eyes. At the front was a white girl with shoulder length hair, marked by a pink stripe towards the front. She was Christian, or as she preferred, Cris. Cris was about your height prior to shrinking, maybe slightly taller…5”10 or such. She was always a bubbly person, energetic, yet not so much that she annoyed people. Always an adventurous type she often told you stories about how reckless she acted, like sneaking out with friends and such. It wasn’t something you’d do but you envied her for it. Her figure was a bit nice, C-Cups, good butt; she often wore bright outfits that reflected her personality. Today’s outfit being a neon green t-shirt with some jeans and tennis shoes, you also noted orange nails…she sure picked odd colors, but that’s why you loved her…hell you even had a mild crush on her, but friendship was more important.

Next to her was another dear friend, Jasmine. Light dark skin as well as pretty short, five foot even, but she made up for it with her chest with looked to be about D’s or at least, borderline D’s. She had shoulder-length black hair usually tied in a ponytail, today it wasn’t for once, coupled with a dark grey short sleeve shirt and jeans. Jas was a bit of an anime fanatic, particularly yaoi, not your forte but hey, whatever floats your boat. You and Jas often had fan boy/girl moments together, clearly showing a strong friendship. She may jokingly insult you at times but the two of you were practically family. Like Cris she was quite cute too, but also like Cris friendship was more important with her.

Third in the group was Kelly, Cris’ step-sister. Not surprisingly she and Cris had different personalities, Cris being bubbly and energetic and Kelly being more sarcastic and lazy. She usually wore hoodies so you never got a good look at her figure, but you suspected smaller C’s. Her hair was the shortest of the group, hardly even chin-length, but she styled the brown locks into a nice shaggy look to go with her glasses. Jeans and a white and black hoody were her outfit. About average height…she seemed the normal-est in appearance out of your friends. The two of you were never really that close but you were considered friends.

The last one in the group caught your eye the most, shoulder length black hair and a cute smile worn. Her name was Lakin. Lakin personality wise was a lot like you, enjoyed the same things, same food, and even had similar mannerisms. She had a great figure with D-Cups, tight jeans revealing her rear, and often wearing just the right amount of makeup. Coincidentally the two of you had the same Birthday, right down to the day. Why does she stand out? You had a major crush on her. Right away when you saw her you liked her, she had a cute white face, but it seemed to hold some asian features too, like slightly smaller than average eyes, similar face structure…it was a unique and overall beautiful look. You met her almost four years ago…and boy did you mess up that year. You acted like an idiot trying to gain her attention, to make a long story short; it pretty much listed you as an annoyance. She entered a relationship shortly afterwards and it lasted until about a month ago. Through all this time the longing just seemed to build, but you’d learned enough not to be a complete idiot. You were decent friends, but you wanted far more than that. You took an extra moment to look at her. Light grey shirt with AC-DC on it, black skirt, and black flip-flops. She…just looked beautiful…you had to bite your tongue a bit.

The group came towards yours, each waving a bit. Ashlei, Dianna, and even Lilith all cheerily waved back; you gave a nonchalant wave too. Idle chatter started soon afterwards, nothing truly important. With Lakin around you were a bit shy so you only chipped in small witty comments at regular intervals. But all in all it was nice hanging around your friends, you almost forgot about your height…almost.

Everything just went to hell in an instant though, twenty minutes had gone by and everyone agreed to grab some breakfast before it was too late. You all started to leave with you and Cris at the back...and Cris stumbled on something. Naturally she tried to catch herself as she fell, but as luck would have it the nearest thing was you. Instinctively she grabbed your sleeve and pulled…dragging you down with her.

“Woah!” A small thud was heard as you and Cris fell, you under Cris somehow. After a mild groan Cris got up, “Thanks Lu!” She extended a hand to you, and of course you took it; key mistake.

With Cris’ help you got back on your feet, but now you were face to face…and everyone was looking…with someone normally your height this close it was clear you were smaller…in fact you were at eye length with her upper chest (Great view.)

You closed your eyes and bit your lip, everyone would surely notice this…notice...your height...
11223121111112.title: Chillin with Friends

choices: Doll-Sized(About 8 inches) right on time for some mean senior girls to come by
An INCREDIBLY tiny size...the pain of the bus was too great(1/100th inch tall)
112231211111121.content:
"Did you get smaller?!"Cris shouted, surprise evient in her voice and posture, her eyes brighter and wider than usual.

The silence following afterwards was one of the most awkward and shame-filled moment of your life thus far. You pinched the bridge of your nose and inhaled deeply, releasing a great sigh seconds later."Y-yeah..."You mutter."I had a little....accident. Shrank a bit."

"Are you okay?"Lakin asked, her voice sultry and relaxation in sound form. You nodded with cheeks a tad red. All of your friends gave you a look of innocent pity, all feeling for you. Each one gave a word or two of reassurance, and you smiled slightly. Still, them noticing hurt inside. Plus Cris's outburst had the whole school abuzz with the news of your diminishing. It was old news to the school, but every time you came back a bit smaller, there were always whispers. Fingers pointing, eyes adverting. And that was just the least of it. Some of the Seniors took full advantage of your small size, pulling painful pranks and the sorts.

Luckily, most of the school day, your friends were always close at hand, acting as a wall to protect you from those who dared to venture too close. As the final bell rang at the end of the afternoon, the whole student body rushed out to leave their educational prison, all hitching rides with friends, driving themselves, or waiting to be picked up. You and your friends would wait for the bus.

In the parking lot, you all sat down, the bus coming soon. You knew they wanted to talk to you, but you stubbornly remained quiet. The condition you were in...always made you uncomfy to speak about it.

Lakin's hand gently patted your shoulder, and you jumped up, jolting from the sudden touch. You whirred around with a dismal face."It's...it's okay!!"You said."I don't want any comfort...I don't even want to talk about it!!"

"Luke..."Dianne motioned to stand up, but you turned around and started walking."I said I don't want to talk! Call me when the bus is he-"

You were cut short as the yellow metal wall known as the front of the school bus slammed right into you.

Among screams and swirling, twisting blackness of subconsciousness, you felt the odd sensation of shrinking once again."Luke...Luke!"You tried to guess the voice calling out to you, but it was distant and much too far away to recognize.

You shrink down to....
112231211111121.title: Shame

choices: He's next to you, the same size on one of your friend's beds
1122312111111211.content: Doll sized. You were now very small. Two senior girls were the ones who picked you up. She squeezed too tight and as your vision blurred, you heard a boy say, "Put him down you stupid bitch." She gasped and the grip was removed. You were still fading to unconciousness but heard a guy say, "You say that to my girlfriend, I'll cut you good!" A switchblade came out and there was a deep breath released by someone. Your eyes opened to see a mean-looking guy stabbing another guy in the chest. It was clearly his heart. He had long black hair, and he fell. You faded away, not knowing what could be next. When you wake up.......
1122312111111211.title: A prank, and a bad one at that.

11223121111112112.content:
A massive force pressing into your body stirred you into consciousness. You groaned, not opening your eyes immediately. Your entire body ached and you remembered the bus. You were laying on your stomach on some kind of rough fabric. You were about to roll over when the force pressed down on you again, pushing you into whatever this giving surface was.

"Cris, quit poking him. What're you trying to do, squish him?" A familiar voice whispered from above. Jaz? You started to roll over now to see where her voice was coming from.

"Sorry! He's just so cute like this and-"

"Hold on. I think he's waking up." You opened your eyes to see Jaz's enormous face looming over you. On either side of her Cris and Kelly leaned in curiously. You rub your eyes to make sure it wasn't a dream. Their humongous faces would have dwarfed Mt. Rushmore. You looked down and realized you were on Jaz's huge lap or thigh anyway. The large plateau of blue jean was just one in a row of rolling legs. Jaz's torso stretched above you like a towering cliff face. You were smaller than ever.

"What happened? Where are we?" You called up.

"Well Lu, you managed to get hit by a bus, some seniors grabbed you and killed you by accident, you shrunk down to like half an inch tall, 'slept' through school in Diana's locker, and now we're in Lankin's car." Jaz said matter-of-factly. You turned around to see that you were indeed in a car. Even the most basic details like the seats and the pine tree air-freshener seemed alien. From the front and passenger seats Lankin and Diana gave concerned looks.

Your mind swam with everything Jaz just said. Most unbelievable was your size. Half an inch? You weren't much bigger than a bug. Looking at Cris, you remembered your entire body being pressed down. You realized at this size she, or anyone else for that matter, could probably squish you under the pad of their thumb. Frightened by the thought, you staggered backward a bit. Your friends seemed to notice your distress.

"Lu, relax." Jaz reached out an enormous hand, making you even more anxious. You retreated even faster. Kelly and Cris tried to help console you, to no avail. In an effort to evade Jaz's tree-like fingers, you side-stepped, only to loose your balance and tumble down the side of her leg. You rolled uncontrollably until you hit the narrow strip of seat at the bottom of the valley between her thighs. Before you could scramble away two giant fingers pinched your ankle with surprising caution. Quickly, you were lifted to Jaz's face.

"Lu, I know this must be crazy but don't freak out on me. You're safe with us." Jaz said. She gave you a reassuring smirk, which you would have thought was impossible. Despite your relief, you were getting dizzy being upside-down for this long.

"Awww he's blushing." Cris said, squinting at your tiny face.

"No, I think that's just the blood rushing to his head." Kelly said with a smirk.

"Oh, sorry Lu!" Jaz dropped you back on her lap.

"It's okay." You said still a bit disoriented, "Where are we going anyway?"
11223121111112112.title: Wake-Up Call

1122312111111212.content:
Voices. That was the only muffled, far away sound you heard that kept you from fading into the tempting darkness of unconscious, and possibly, permanent death. You moaned, gritting your teeth to fight back the pain, clinching your eyes shut to keep from waking up. Your entire body felt like it was broken, on fire, and torn apart all at the same time. But slowly, you knew it was healing. It always happened like this. Normal people died from broken spines. If your spine cracked and shattered, the bones and muscle would simply realign themselves all sinew and order was in place again.

The voices again.

They called out to you, beckoning you back to the world of the large. You didn't want to go back. You just wanted to forever stay in this state of continual sleep and still body, relaxed and away from the troubles of life. Maybe if you ignored them long enough, they would fade away as well.

Unfortunately, no. The voices only grew louder, and their lingering became full on blasting within your eardrums and all around you. You were jolted free from the peaceful escape of the blackness, only to open your eyes to a terrible new world.

Before you appeared to be a mountain, towering, piercing the sky, filled with craggy outlines you could dissapear into. But no, your senses and percievance knew this wasn't a mountain. It was a pebble. A pebble you could toss into your pocket and forget about, as big as Mount Everest. And beyond that, impossibly huge things and beings that, honestly, terrified the living freaking shit out of you.
1122312111111212.title: Greatest Shame

choices: She and your friends speak to you right there
They have to hand you over to a Teacher
11223121111112121.content:
A hand descended from the heavens, it's size too grand and massive to gauge with a simple quick look alone. It came closer and closer to you magnifying the fear inside you to as big as the unfathomable hand was. You turned to try and run, but the biggest and fastest always dominated over the small. All the hand had to do was tap you with it's index finger, and considering you microscopic size, which you still hadn't gauged as well, you instantly stuck to the surface of the skin, body heat and skin oils making sure you stayed on. But the whole ride up on the finger, it was gentle, going at a steady pace so you wouldn't fall off. To whomever god this hand belonged to, it was a kind deity.

As the ride ended and slowed, you realized this was no god, but a goddess, who had retrieved you. Past the vast wastelandic desert that was the finger's plain, an entire eye filled the sky beyond you. It was the entire sky, and the universe, and all of the heavens beore you. The black pupil was like an eclipsed sun, the coloring around it cosmic in scale, and the remaining white of the eye worlds past you. But there was something you recognized of this goddess's eye.

"L-Lakin...?'"You gasped, not knowing whether to be in greater fear or relief.
11223121111112121.title: Lakin's Eye, Filling the Entire Sky

112231211111121211.content:
"Hey, Luke..."Lakin tried to whisper as softly as she could, but her massively amplified size counteracted her kind gesture. Her voice was as loud as a thousand sonic booms and as deep as the voice of a god, yet retaining it's feminine undertone."Are you okay?"

"I'm....I'm fine!!"You cupped your hands around your mouth, trying to make your own miniscule voice as loud as it could get. The eye in front of you squinted, another huge wall of skin, as to convey confusion."Speak a bit louder, please."

You took in a deep breath, and screamed your repetition, hurting your throat in the process. The eye widened back to it's normal state."You sure, Luke? I mean, you are pretty small....I have to concentrate really hard just to notice you."She sighed."Luke, we were really worried about you."

She moved her finger in a sweeping motion, revealing the other godlike faces of your friends, millions of miles away, but all showing concern for you, there microscopic friend."When you were hit by the bus, we all jumped to our feet. We thought you had....had..."

"Finally taken the dirt nap."Cris added, ever blunt, her voice far away, but still shattering in it's magnitude.

Another sigh from Lakin, this time for Cris's comment."After you were hit, you just lied there on the concrete, blood spilling out of you...more..more than an average person should bleed. But you didn't look flushed at all. After a few seconds, all the bruises on your skin began to dissapear, all of the broken and out of place bits of your body went back to normal. Then you began to shrink...first it was all slow. Then it went faster and faster, until you completely dissapeared from our sight."

"I thought you were gone forever...but remember that scienece activity we did a few days ago in biology. Dianne had a magnifying glass, so we scoured the area over the place you shrank. Few more minutes later....we find you, right next to an ant walking by. I flicked it away."

You were relieved to find that they stopped the ant from probably eating you.

"Lu...in comparison, you could probably fit on top of one of the ant's antennae feelers, and still have plenty of room to walk around on."

You gulped. The fear was back.

"B-but...."

"We're just okay you're alright."They all said in unison. Lakin lowered her hand until it was in the middle of the group, and all of the girls tried their best to hug the hand and not crush you at the same time. You couldn't help it. You began to cry. Luckily, you were much too small for anyone to see your wweakness. After the friendfest, they all had decided that you would spend the night with one of them. They had called your mother and asked, but they did not mention the fact that you had shrunken down to microscopic size. After some lies about homework, she agreed, and now all you had to do was decide which friend to go with. Two choices came to mind...
112231211111121211.title: Pity, Friends, And Condolences

choices: "I'm sleepy.....you want to go to bed?"
1122312111111212111.content:
"Ready, Luke?"Lakin asked, walking home. She lived just a ten minute jog away, and she held you on her finger the whole time."Luke..."She said after halfway there."I'm...glad you're okay."

"Er...t-thanks."You replied, not knowing what else to add. Before this traumatic event, Lakin had barely spoken two words to you, usually just nodding or smiling to acknowledge your presence. But now, this is the most she's ever said to you. Maybe this whole 'shrinking to microscopic size' wasn't bad after all. The next five minutes was wrapped in silence until she arrived at her house. She entered, sounds of voices and actions instantly barraging your senses."I have a big family..."She said, guessing the sudden outburst taking you by surprise. Somehow, she managed to sneak past the occupied rooms of family members and slipped into her own bedroom, the door closing silently without even a creak or a click.

"So....yeah. This is my room."Lakin said, moving in a circular motion, giving you a pan-around view of her abode. Oddly, despite Lakin's gorgeous , drop-dead looks, her room was quite bare. She walked over to her desk and sat down, settling you on the desktop in front of her, and leaned forward, squinting her eyes to focus in on you."Wow...I...I still can't get over how small you are. Just an hour ago, you were at least considered a person."She quickly corrected herself."I...I mean...you're still a person, I..I just meant....I'll shut up now."

You just uh-huh'd in reply, as you were too distracted to hear her words, most of them just coming out as far away echoes to your ears. When Lakin leaned forward and pressed her torso up against the desk, her massive breasts jutted up in her shirt, pushing through and revealing an expansive amount of cleavage. You gulped as you tried to resist the wood coming on down there."Oop....too late."You muttered to yourself, feeling your pants grow tight at the sight of two planets, fleshy and monolithic, filling your vision."Luke....do you like me?"Lakin questioned out of nowhere. That caught your attention for the moment, you adverting your eyes from her chest to her face higher up.

"W-why would y-y-y-you a-a-ask that...?!"You replied, feeling quite nervous at the moment, all the blood in your crotch now rushing back up to your cheeks.

She shrugged."I've caught you looking at me sometimes, and I just never said anything. You look at me with...passion. And sometimes, whenever we're both in a group with our friends, whenever I'm talking, you listen with a face of intent and concentration."

"I don't know...what you're talking about..."You gasp out.

"Luke....please."

"I don't...."

"Please don't lie. Just tell the truth."

You take in a deep breath to steady yourself. You've dreamt of this day happening, a chance to finally reveal how you really felt about Lakin, but this was a complete nightmare. You weren't ready. You weren't prepared for this at the moment.

"Luke..."She pressed on.

It was now or never. Another deep breath in, you puffing out your chest to swell your physique, it didn't make much of a difference."Lakin...I...I..."

She looked down, eyes filled with curiosity and intent, as she said of you earlier.

"I......LOVE YOU."You screamed."THERE, I SAID IT!! I LOVE YOU LAKIN! I LOVE YOU!!"You poured your every being into those words, shouting yourself hoarse like you did earlier. It felt like you were free, it felt like every single weight and depression had been lifted off of you. After a minute of awkward silence, well to you at least, Lakin's full lips parted to speak. They curled up into a gentle smile"Thank you, Luke. I'm...flattered. Really. Truly."

You didn't know if these words were for better, or for worse.

"And....I find you...kind of adorable too. I mean, you had your looks before....those red eyes, but now, I guess your size just makes you cuter."

The better.

You grin the widest grin you could possibly manage.

"T-thanks, Lakin...."You try to muster out words.

She opened her mouth to speak once more.
1122312111111212111.title: Lakin

11223121111112121111.content:
You gulped, half-filled with pure shining happiness, and the other half dreary nervousness. Lakin's words were bittersweet to you. She said the word 'boyfriend', which sent you into a giddy renzy. On the other half, you thought she was faking it just to toy with you. Considering your newest size, you guessed people would begin to treat you much, much differently. You truly hoped this wouldn't become a moment where you become Lakin's personal slave for the remainder of your life As you gazed up at her smiling, beautiful face, maybe the latter wouldn't be so bad after all.

Lakin reached down and laid her index finger beside you, ushering you to climb back onto her nail. You scrambled onto the tall wall and sat down, Lakin gently bringing you up. She walked over to her bed in the corner and sat down on the edge, kicking off her flip flops in the process, the monolithic footwear landing with a simultaneous thunderclap across the room. Slowly, Lakin lowered her hand until her finger made contact with the floor. You looked up, unsure of what was happening."Go on,get of my nail. It'll be fine, Luke."She giggled.You slid down off the nail onto a wasteland of wood floor. Looking about, several things divided up your attention. First, the vast size of the entire room was finally concieved. As you gazed around slackjawed, you spotted mountains in the distance. Squinting your eyes and looking closer, you gasped at the mountains true forms. Dust bunnies. Little balls of dust were entire mountain ranges to you. Lastly, you looked at Lakin's bare feet in front of you. Even at this miniscule size, you barely spotted any imperfection on them. Not a sign of dirt, lint or any other form of foot-related mess. The skin appeared almost silk-like in nature. But what really drew your eyes was the size difference. Each toe could've been an entire country all it's own, and you wouldn't be surprised if you found microscopic civilizations living within the wrinkles between her toes, each of the wrinkles and pores probably deep enough to outmatch the grand canyon itself.

Your 'girlfriend', as you deemedso far, coughed from above, and you looked upwards now, Lakin's looming form godlike in stature. No matter how far you craned your neck backwards, you could only catch a sliver of a glimpse past her ankles alone. But oh, could you imagine plenty. Her toned and slender legs reaching higher and higher for miles, her slim stomach a wall, her gargantuan boobs hovering in the air like two planets within orbit of one another, and her face, the face of an entire galaxy smiling down from the heavens.

Another coug from her snatched you away from dreamland.

"Luke, I guess if we're to be a couple, I suppose we should start out by playing a few games together."She explained.

"What kind of games?"You questioned.

"Well....an exercise of sorts."

"....Then why am I on the ground?"

"It's....different. Would you....mind climbing me?"

".....What?"

"Oh, oh-oh no! Don't be confusing me for some sort of pervert! I...I just thought that it would be kinda....funny....fun, I guess."

"Really?"You cross your arms, gazing up once more, thinking back to your thoughts from before, and you knew this would be a perfect chance to make them real. How you loved perverted tendencies.

"Y-you don't have to do it if you don't want to..."She began to sound nervous. Funny, somebody your size should be the nervous one around somebody of her scale.

"No!"You interupte her."I'll do it, sure!!"

"Oh yay!"She quipped, clapping her hands."Jut begin whenever you're ready. I don't wanna rush you."

As you prepared yourself,Lakin's body gave away the exact opposite of her words. Her toes drummed against the ground impatiently, generating a series of small, yet powerful, eathquakes. You shrugged, stretched a bit more, and began jogging towards the nearest monument, Lakin's right big toe. After ten minutes of keeping pace, you reached the massive apendage, slightly with less breath and energy than before. Catchin yourself, you grasped onto the toe, hefting yourself up to begin climbing it. There were many footholds within the textue of the skin to keep you aloft from falling, and you were happy to say that the skin did indeed feel like smooth silk.
11223121111112121111.title: "Wanna play a few games....boyfriend?"

112231211111121211111.content:
With each pull, you felt happier as you climbed higher and higher. With each pull of your body, with each pull upwards, you were getting closer and closer to your titanic new 'girlfriend'. So high above, Lakin's soft giggling was rumbling thunderstrikes to you, yet it contained a gentle playfulness. Despite the major size difference, you knew that...Lakin would never hurt you intentionally. Any of your friends, for that matter. As you reached mid-toe height clocking in at 30 minutes, your thoughts began to drift, your body switching to a monotonous automatic mode of ascension. Jaz looked down at you with mock despair."Give up anime? I can't even begin to comprehend the thought...."

Another shared laugh. Jaz stood up and stretched, settling you on her bedside table."DON'T move. Cause' if I can't find you now, and if I DO find you later on, your microscopic ass it getting stomped."

She entered her closet and shut the door. You were a tad dissapointed, but you knew it was extremely perverted to think of it. She was your friend, after all.

She then herself settled into her bed, eying you with a curious expression.

".....W-what?"You ask after an awkward minute or so.

"Nothing. Just thinking of where I should put you to sleep, shorty. I can't lose you after just one afternoon. Now, it has to be someplace secure, someplace that if I looked there again, I'd find you...."

A momentary image flashed through your mind of this same scenario with all your friends. Them in all their naked glory. You, a speck between their toes. It was a weirdly arousing thought. Of course they almost all had pretty feet so that helped. But when given a chance between staring at someone's chest or their feet it wasn't really a contest. You were halfway tempted to agree with Jaz but the last thing you needed was to admit to liking her dominating games. "I'd really rather not." You respond between licks.

Jaz smirked, "Depending on how well you do I just might. Get to work slave!" The giantess pointed a finger commandingly at her toes. "Your Queen demands licking now!"

"Get ready speck. Big old Jaz is about to get out of the tub."

You readied yourself to be picked up from Jaz's toes. However the girl didn't seem to have the slightest intention of grabbing you. A smirk popped onto her face. "Hold on tight."

Hurricane class winds blew you deep into the girl's toe cleavage as miles and miles of land passed you by in a rapid blur. 11223121111112121122111212.content:
"Yeah... We are going to play the game!" giant Jaz exclaimed happily.
"What game?" you asked with a dropping tone. "Is it dangerous?"
"Heck no! What, do you think I am a monster?" she grabbed your tiny figure, and with a rapid rise, you found yourself lying on her fingertip in the front of her enormous eye. "We will play a maze! And I will be a minotaur! Like from the Greek myths!"
Even you couldn't see all her face, you knew that she was super happy. Then, as you were thinking what type of maze it would be, she blinked, with you still on the finger near her eye. It raised gusts enough to wind you up, but you landed back on the fingertip.
"Jaz, minotaur?" you asked after you caught breath. "You are beyond anything right now for me!" you shout, hoping to be heard.
"Hey, I did say punishment, right? The punishment will be..."
"Jaz, come on!" you shout. "You can't be serious! I am already punished enough!" you added in a displeased tone.
What you haven't learned through your short microscopic life is that giants are giants. Jaz didn't even listen to your cries and went straight to the table in her room, where she without any hesitation - though carefully - dropped you on some white knotted surface, with little fibers not higher than your toes. You quickly found out it was a piece of paper when she grabbed a pencil and started drawing on. Several times the giant piece of wood made the way near you and you actually felt how the sheet bent under it.
"Alright, Luke! There is a maze!" she exclaimed, after she finished drawing. "Rule is simple: you get in, you get out. Time's limited: you need to get to the exit in an hour! You start here and finish here!" and you see how giant hand moved the pointed wood somewhere it started blurring. "Do it, or there will be consequences!"
"JAAAZZ!" you shout, but she didn't hear you or - simply wasn't paying attention.
"Ready, set, go!"
After a second of hesitation, you ran towards the maze entrance.

You decided to start by cleaning Jaz's tongue, since you were already on it. The problem was that it was just so big. You were pretty much smack dab in the middle of it, and it seemed to expand around you in every direction for miles. It stretched all the way back into the darkness of her throat, a place you were now very much intent on avoiding.

You reached down to grab some of the gunk from the surface of her tongue, but quickly realised there was no way to dispose of it... unless you were to deposit it directly into Jaz's stomach yourself. Which meant venturing into her throat and possibly into the belly of the beast. The more you thought about it, the more the idea appealed to you. What was it like in Jaz's stomach?

Forgoing your cleaning duty, you set out with a newfound sense of adventure and excitement, curiosity urging you further into the colossal mouth. It took some time before you reached the gullet, with things staying relatively calm and mundane along the way thanks to the fact Jaz was relaxing in the bath. Slowly you clambered down into the throat and began to carefully climb down her food pipe. Eventually it was too difficult to hold on to anything and you slipped, descending down through Jaz's esophagus with great speed. In seconds, you had traveled from in her neck to her upper belly area.

You landed inside Jaz's stomach with an insignificant plop, amid the churning pit of digesting breakfast. Swimming to the surface, you struggled to stay afloat but were ecstatic to be in the belly. It was incredibly warm and the air was rife with the gross stench of digestion, but it didn't matter. The experience itself was so bizarre and surreal that you couldn't help but be excited.

Meanwhile, Jaz was just about ready to get out of the bath. She opened her mouth to let you out. "You ready to come out?"

Nothing.

"Hello? You still in there?" she asked, not knowing you were currently in her belly. It didn't take her long to figure it out. "Wait... you're not... in my tummy?"

She stood in the bath, rubbing her naked belly.

Beyond that was the shoe itself, colored light violet and overall clean to the normal eye, to your newly found perception of the world, it was filthy enough to be a tad disgusted. The mere size of it was indescribable at best, mountain seemed…too small a word, yet not quite planet-sized either…a sort of middle ground between those two sizes. Your mouth was agape simply from looking at it, it hadn't even registered yet that there was a person wearing this astronomically large shoe. You just stood there, dazed and dumbfounded by the mere size of the simplest things of the world now. You looked to your own shoes, then the pair before you, it was hard to accept they were once the same…no…your feet were actually probably bigger once. Now your entire body didn't even measure up to the dirt on its sole.

Voices snapped you from the daze, loud, booming voices that seemed to come from the very heavens themselves. Was it the voices of God? No…Goddess would be more appropriate, the voices were magnified beyond comprehension, but still clearly feminine. There were a few of them…six…or more…? It was hard to tell for certain. Plus his sob stories usually got to the Principal. The compromise was that he was at the front of the bus line. He was by no means a bad driver, but better safe than sorry. He had a clean record for hitting people…til now. Just your luck…

How small could it have made you? There was no way he built up enough speed…then again…with your condition there was no exact science. It was probably just enough to kill you and you just got unlucky. Either way, here you were, easily less than a tenth of an inch tall, before this grand shoe that seemed unbelievably big. The Goddess you were staring at spoke and her voice told you the same thing her body did. It was Jaz, one of your black friends. In fact, one of your best friends; and she was towering over you as this planetary-sized Goddess. No matter how hard you strained your neck you couldn't go past her hips; but you imagined her chest blocked her face anyway.

Another voice came from far above, just behind you. You turned to a pair of black sandals, towering just as high as the treads with toes that honestly looked big enough to fit a city on…or twelve. Looking around you spotted a good pair of shoes as big as the others, and coming from them was the immense figures of your admittedly gorgeous, Goddess-like friends: Jaz, Lakin, Cris, Kelly, Lilith, Ashei, and Diane. All no doubt worried over you. Thankfully their voices weren't magnified to the point you couldn't understand them.

"Where'd he go?!" Jaz quickly asked everyone.

Cris was the first to respond, "I don't know!"

"I think he shrank…" Kelly muttered.

"What! We gotta find him!"

"How?" Ashei looked to the others.

"Crouch and start looking!"

Diane made a worried expression, "Oh God, what if I stepped on him…?"

"Check your shoes!" Cris exclaimed. Each girl promptly checked, of course you weren't beneath any feet quite yet, though Lakin's came dangerously close on the way back down. The booms of all their feet as they simply placed them on the ground made you concerned at your size even more. Once it was made clear you weren't decorating anyone's soles the gang bent over to look for you. Naturally you started jumping to try and get their attention; but dude…did you have a nice view.

Diane, Cris, Ashei, and Lakin were all wearing revealing shirts; and bent over…you caught sight of the most enormous breasts imaginable. Valleys of absolute beauty you could live and worship forever, especially Lakin's…you drooled a bit just thinking about it. At least this has some positives. You told yourself optimistically. The others may not have had the shirts…but their butts looked pretty good from there too. Jaz by far had the best one though. You laughed at the stereotype regarding black girls proven true. Hell, you actually looked at a couple of the pairs of feet (Mainly Lakin's of course) and felt a bit attracted by them! Obviously shrinking was bad but…seeing girls liked this kicked ass…There was no denying it, hormones were going off right now and frankly, they helped perk you up a lot. You grinned and jumped up and down hyperly.

"Guys! Over here!" You cried as loud as you could. None of the gang reacted though. You were too small to try to communicate from a distance. Thankfully they were looking for you though. Jump enough and you were sure to be saved from God-knows-what.

Easier said than done though, the pebbles decorating the street were bigger than you, and your black shirt did little to make you stand out. To help boost your odds you actually took it off, dealing with the chills of the smaller world as waved your arms and shirt around. Minutes passed and things started to look bleak…people passed looking at your dear friends scanning the ground like they were weirdoes. Having thought they searched your spot enough; the group dispersed a bit, and of course didn't find you wherever they were. The only person remotely close to you was Kelly, the one person you were hardly friends with. But anyone was better than no one; you devoted yourself to trying to gain her attention. Her glasses said she had bad eyesight, that didn't help morale any.

But whether it was chance, or plain dumb-luck, Kelly turned to look directly at you. "Hmm?" She turned around and carefully crawled towards you. Miles and miles away you heard Jaz's voice ring out, "Anyone find him?" The universal answer was no, only Kelly didn't respond. She crawled until her hands were just before you. Then…
11223121111112122.title: Being Small Has at Least One Advantage

112231211111121221.content:
The enormous form of Kelly's eye darted around until it locked on, the words she said never sounded so beautiful. "Is that you Luke...?" It was soft, but a whisper; yet it might as well have been from an angel herself. You cheered. "Yeah! It's me Kelly!"

The girl extended her finger, "Can you get on my nail?"

Not only could you, you were already on it. You were filled with renewed energy at being found. It sat carefully against the black-painted surface hanging on to her finger for dear life. You weren't scared though. In fact, you were near giddy. You were safe! Talk about a bullet dodged!

Cris' voice called from far away, checking with everyone again. "Kelly! You find him?"

Kelly paused, eye darting to her finger. She said...
112231211111121221.title: She Found You

choices: Kelly smirking at you."You're mine now."
Kelly AND Cris smiling down at you."I told you our plan would work!"Cris laughed
1122312111111212212.content:
"....No...I haven't seen him..."Kelly called back to her sister, shifting her eyes back to you nervously. You looked up curiously, questioning why she would say that. You didn't need a response in words, her actions spoke. She stood up, looked around quickly, and dropped you into the pocket of her jeans. With your small size, the fall was long. Incredibly long. You plummeted for what seemed like hours before hitting the bottom of the pocket, the lint and the jean fabric cushioning you, keeping you from dying at the moment. Higher up, a twinkle of light was the opening to the pocket. You could hear the voices of the giantess's slightly.

"I....I can't find him..."Kelly cried out, her voice cracking, and you could imagine fake tears rolling down her face."I....I think he shrank so small....we could never find him again...."

More words from the others, but they were muffled. Kelly began to walk, and her jeans tigthened against her leg with each stride, sandwhiching you snugly between jean fabric and her thigh. You would find this attractive at the moment, but apparantly, Kelly had just lied straight to the faces of your and her friends, and had decided to keep you to herself.

After what seemed like more hours later, time must be different for tinier beings, Kelly must have arrived home with Cris. The confines of the pocket was enfuriating to you, and you wanted to escape. Your wish was granted as a hand entered the pocket, pulling you out, revealing the vaster, much more infinite world once again.

You saw....
1122312111111212212.title: Stolen Away

choices: "There's nothing that turns me on more than crushing you between our feet..."
"There's nothing that turns me on more than you struggling in my/our boobs...
11223121111112122122.content:
To your shock, it wasn't just Kelly staring down at you, it was also Cris! Both them wearing a large smile at the sight of you once more. Now, you could understand Kelly pulling something like this, but Cris? It simply didn't fit. Aloud all you could mutter were a few disgruntled, confused words. Kelly noticed this and laughed, "Aww, look Cris…it's confused. It must not know why you're here."

You didn't take too kindly to being called It, but had no time to think much of it before Cris spoke. "Haha, well I guess It would be sort of confused. I mean, I didn't even think about this until you mentioned it."

Mentioned it…? You glared to Kelly; of course this was her doing. She was manipulative, something like this she probably had planned out way beforehand. With that realization you began to notice more of the world around you. You were situated on a bed, neatly made, and on the bed were Kelly and Cris, both sitting so that their legs pushed up against their body and their knees were near their chins. Each of their bare feet loomed before you ominously. The room looked to be Cris' room, band posters, a computer desk, light pink walls with a colorful series of decorations. Sure fit her profile.

Kelly smirked at her sister, "Just wait, we haven't even had any fun yet." To give a brief little show she poked her foot towards you. Her big toe came directly overhead, and before you could even react, it came on top of you. You heard a surprised gasp of a chuckle escape Cris' mouth as that happened. "Woah, Kelly. Did you just…?"

In response the step-sister pulled her foot back and pointed her sole towards her sister, your form was clearly present along the confines of her big toe, if not hard to see. "Stuck to my toe like a little bug." She sneered.

"That's awesome!" Cris exclaimed, eyes lit with excitement.

"Told ya." Kelly looked back to you and seemed to narrow her eyes, "How is it little one? Does It enjoy being down there?"

Far from the case; you weren't a foot guy in any sense of the word. Sure, like some people you caught sight of the occasional foot that you stopped to look at for a moment, Lakin…Jaz…even Cris once, but you were hardly into feet. Kelly's were…well she always wore sneakers and was known as a bit of a tomboy if that gave any indication. In other words, it wasn't as well-kept as Cris' feet. No nail polish, a few specks of dirt between her toes, and most notable, the foul odor that came along with it. Kelly knew you hated it, and you weren't gonna give her the satisfaction of seeing you suffer. "I'd rather Cris' actually." You wittily shouted back.

Both girls jumped back for a second in surprise. Kelly quickly regained herself and gave her sister a look, one that said "I told you so…" Cris merely looked to her orange-painted toes in a fascination at what sort of attraction they held for you. Honestly, none, but it wasn't what Kelly expected, that's for sure.

The brief silence was broken by Kelly, "Well then…Would you like It for a moment Cris?"

Cris showed few signs of hesitating, "I would…But I have to head to the bathroom first." She hopped off the bed in one loud boom, her feet sounded like they broke the floor with their landing. "Be right back." She winked towards you and her sister before leaving the room.

With Cris gone you and Kelly glared at each other, "I'm sure you're wondering a lot." She sounded downright contempt. Her finger forcibly scraped you from her toe and soon you were sitting on her fingernail, eye to eye with the giantess. It was a stare down you lost instantly; you couldn't try to be tough when the damn eye itself was big as a small mountain.

"What did you do?" You asked accusingly.

All Kelly did was shrug, "It was surprisingly easy you know. All I had to do was tell Cris you secretly liked the idea of being small. All that domination stuff. After some convincing she went with it, said it might make the best of a bad situation. Thanks by the way; with what you said about her feet I bet she's all for this now."

Damn, your own smart-mouth moved worked against you. No wonder Cris seemed so peppy about this; to her she was going to make her friend really happy. Only you and Kelly knew the truth. "What about when I start screaming for her to stop?"

Kelly smirked, "Already covered. I told her that you'd probably do something like that to make the fantasy more real. As far as she knows, this is all something me and you planned together. However, only my opinion matters at this point."

Your teeth gritted before you even told them to. You never were too fond of Kelly, the looks she had regarding your condition were just…disturbing. You went with your gut on that one, and, unfortunately, your gut was right. "What about that whole It thing? I have a name you know."

"Wrong, people have names. And you're a bug. I just had to call you It and Cris thought it was all for your perverted little fantasies. It's appropriate though. You're right where you should be, before me, scared. With the slightest whim I can make my toes seem like planets to you. Maybe you could start a civilization down there, join up with some microscopic bugs and worship me."

"You're nuts." Was your only rebuttal, though a quiver in your legs said Kelly was right; you were scared.

Kelly didn't look very happy at that, "Be careful Bug, I've spent a lot of time thinking about what I could do to you like this. Even more looking it up. I can torture you in ways you never even imagined before. In a week I can have you begging to live on my feet if I really wanted to. I own you now Luke. Get used to it."

"Cris will catch on. She's not dumb." You didn't sound too sure though.

"Possibly, but I'm smarter. And if worst comes to worst, a bug came and killed you. You shrank into nothing and I couldn't find you. She'll be sad, as would everyone else, but they'll move on. And I'll keep the prize."

The depth to which she thought this out…You couldn't even respond you were so horrified. Kelly giggled, "That's right, now you understand. No matter what you're mine tiny. So get used to it."

In the distance, infinite miles away, came the loud sound of a flushing toilet. Kelly quickly lowered you, letting out one last thing before Cris returned. "You know…with all the stuff I've thought of and looked up. There's one thing that just really turns me on…My absolute favorite idea…" You paled and gulped as she told you; because there was no doubt in your mind Kelly was about to get Cris to help her with that.

BOOM!!!

Cris' footsteps upon entering the room rang out louder than ever. They sounded like the sound of something terrible coming. She smirked, "Hey there Kelly...Bug…" She clearly had to alter that last part, "Having fun while I was gone?"

Kelly smirked, "Actually…Me and It got to talking and we decided what to do…" She quickly began explaining her idea to her step-sister. From Kelly's hand your teeth clenched as you replayed the words Kelly said mere moments ago. The words she was essentially telling Cris...
11223121111112122122.title: Kelly AND Cris smiling down at you."I told ...

choices: Cris, having come to tell her sister they have to leave.
A passerby on their way home, a girl from your history class. Sarah.
112231211111121222.content:
With Kelly right before you everything seemed okay. You'd be found. Your friends would make sure everything would be okay...And you can work on adapting to this size. Try to make the best out of a bad situation.

But fate had different things in store.

Your happiness at being so close to being found blinded you to one key thing, the booms that were footsteps. Someone was approaching, and it was only one boom that you heard. In fact, it was the the boom of the foot as it came down on top of you.

BOOM!!!

At your new size it should've killed you. However, fate just kept liking to mess with you. Discarded gum, that was what saved you. Old gum on the bottom of this person's shoe. You were trapped beneath the sole of footwear, alive within a void of pink, pre-chewed and stepped on gunk. It was so sudden you didn't have time to properly process it. You just wondered who was it that messed things up for you? Who did fate choose to snatch you away from safety?
112231211111121222.title: Someone Came and Stepped on You.

choices: "There's....a tiny man in this gum..."Sarah said.
You wiggle too much and fall out of of the gum.
1122312111111212222.content:
Within your new prison, a sticky, pink world, you heard a female voice high above. Despite her walking, the gum underneath her shoe kept you alive from being stomped. As you listened closely, focusing past the thunder and earthquakes of walking, you guessed the giantess was talking on her cell phone. You vaugely recognized the voice....Sarah. A girl from one of your classes, history. Now, you and Sarah were simply mild friends, the two of you never speaking beyond school. She was an average girl, body kinda built dainty, a fair face. She had long black hair, and that's what usually caught your attention whenever she passed. But that was pretty much it. If you ever escaped, you hoped you could get her attention. And beyond that, prayed that she would aid you.

30 Minutes Later

After walking home, Sarah Young wanted to just relax. She had passed by a crowd after school, all of them in a commotion, most of them worriedly shouting 'Luke' or 'Lu'. She knew the kid, he was the one with the freaky disease....but she couldn't exactly remember what it was.

Once inside her home, Sarah plopped down in her living room couch, kicking her feet up against the table in front of her. But as she rested her legs against it, she noticed a disgusting sight."Eww....is that gum on my shoe?!"She remarked, eying the bright, globby mess on the bottom of her right sneaker. She bent forward to remove the sticky substance from her rubber sole...

.........

You never felt more relieved. Sarah had noticed the gum. With her enormous, godlike hand approaching, you struggled to move as much as you could, to try to get some attention. She peeled the gum off, dangling it in front of her face, a look of pure disgust on her delicate features."When did I step in that..?!"She said, standing up to go throw the mess away. You began to shout, you began to shake with all of your miniscule might to get her attention. For a moment, the giantess slowed. She dangled the gum in front of her face once more, squinting a bit, as if she was concentrating. Her confuzed face was a panaramic view that was like a landscape before you, but the size difference didn't frighten you for the moment. You just wanted to be seen!!
1122312111111212222.title: Unknowing

11223121111112122222.content: You heard an echoing snapping noise all round you. Looking around confused, you saw that the strands of pink that once entangled you were loose and free. The next moment, the gum had decided to release you, only for you to plummet through the air, possibly to your doom. As you slowly opened one eye, you saw what was coming closer and closer...
11223121111112122222.title: You wiggle too much and fall out of of the gum.

"Oh hay Ashei" I said as I step back. She looked at me funny as she was trying to figure out if something was different about me. "Is it just me or are you...smaller since the last I saw you" said Ashei as she took a step forward, standing so close to me. Ashei was taller that Dianna was, where I was eye level with Dianna's chin, to Lilith, I was eye level to underneath her chin but above her neck.

Her eyes widen as she knew that I was smaller. "Hay" she said as she wrapped her left arm over the shoulders. "Yeah...you kept on asking me about it when Alexis slipped that info" I said as I looked at her hand.

"Anyway...Lu, I was wondering if you want to hang out somewhere" said Ashei as she looked at me with a grin. Looking at her grin is making me even more scared of. If I didn't know any better, you could say that she...likes little people. Which by the way I hope she doesn't cause if she does, then I'm in big trouble...if you know what I mean.

Since I was too scared to say no, I said "Okay" The two of us walked down the streets.

Ashei looked at me and asked, "Where do you want to hang out?" Feeling a bit scared, I answered...
11223122.title: Ashlei standing taller than me

And now you arrive at her house
112231222.content:
Looking at her I smiled nervously, "Why not your place? I don't think I've ever been there." Although Ashlei was definitely a curious mischief maker you felt more safe with her than in your own home.

"Why not your place? It's closer? She queried, pointing to the house in plain sight.

Shrugging you respond, "With the devil, Ms.Princess, and Mother Moody?" You chuckle at your own little names for the family.

Laughing at your joke Ashlei nodded, "Yeah I see your point, let's go!"

With that you and Ashlei began walking, talking about random things like normal teenagers. However the conversation soon switched to a subject that always made you feel uncomfortable, your condition.

"It true you really shrink up to 1/5 of your size?" Her eyes held this passionate curiousity that said she wouldn't drop this topic until you answered all she wanted.

Nervously turning your eyes you look away, "It depends....sometimes only a few inches sometimes 1/5 of my size. I think it depends on the way I die or something."

All you heard was a sound of amazement, "That's unreal, and you've died twice before?"

Again you avoided your gaze, nodding once, "Yeah, I was lucky it was when I was little, all I did was shrink a few inches to a foot and growth kinda took over there."

Ashlei let out a laugh, "You know what that means? If you never died you'd be like seven to eight feet tall right now!" Thinking for a moment you realize she was right, it never occured to you but without your condition you'd be an amazingly tall guy.

"Does it have to be a certain way for it to work?" Ashlei tossed another question. Shaking your head you actually look at her now, wearing a nervous smile, "Nope, disease,weapons,accidents, anything that causes death would work."

"I see...."
112231222.title: On the way to Ashlei's

1122312221.content:
"I see..." she said as she drew out a gun. As I looked at her and before I had a chance to react, she fired at me right in the face. My body went flying backwards as I hit the floor everything went all dark. I could hear Ashlei's voice echoing through out darkness.

Before I knew it, I saw a bright light but before I could reach for it my eyes opened up with a evil grin across Ashlei's face as she had her hands on her hips. I shot up with a gasp of fresh air and shouted, "The FUCK!"

I rushed onto my feet freaking out at what has just happened. "Oh my god...it worked" said Ashlei as she could hold her laughter. "You fucking shot me, you shot me in the fucking face!" I screamed as I pointed towards her.

"I had to see if it really happens" said Ashlei as she had the sound of joy in her voice. "What if it didn't, you just fucking shot me without a moment thought...god sake woman! What if someone were to have seen you doing that?" I shouted at her. "Oh hush now, if anyone were to have seen me doing so, all I had to say was that we were shooting a small movie for a project" she said as she just put her gun away and walked towards me.

I had no idea what was to happen next as she just over to me and just hugged me. You know, I'm beginning to think that there might be something wrong with Ashei as she acts as if nothing happened.

"Come now, lets see if you really did shrink" said Ashei as she let me go and took a long look at me. To my horror, I noticed that her eyes were higher up than I remembered them to be. " Interesting...can I try it again?" she asked as she put her hand inside her bag. "Fuck no!" I screamed as I ran off. "Hay wait up I was only joking!" laughed Ashei as she chased after me.

To my surprise, she was able to catch up to me as she wasn't able to do so before. "Wow, I guess those little legs of yours won't make you run fast anymore" laughed Ashei as she wrapped her arms around me. This was making me feel trapped as I knew that I have to spend the next few hours with this girl.

As we were walking, I could feel something coming lose inside my mouth. I put my hand in and took out what was lose to mine and Ashei surprise, it was a bullet that was fired from Ashei's gun. "Wow" said the two of us at the same moment.

Along with Ashlei you walked, slowly trudging together until you arrive at her house. The enitre time you constantly shifted your gaze to Ashlei's face, her bag which concealed her gun she used, and to the front. Constantly and repeatedly in that pattern you looked, nervous that she would repeat what she did to you.

"Quit worrying, I'm not gonna shoot you again, Daddy only gave me the gun in self defense, if he sees a ton of bullets gone he'll suspect something." Apparently you weren't hiding your paranoia as well as you thought.

You looked at her nervously, "Can I really trust the answer of a girl who shot me a few minutes ago?"

She smirked, "Is it smart to talk like that to said girl?"

"Good point."

Together you continued walking, doing mental calculations as to how much shorter you got. You lost about six inches give or take, not too bad considering the worst would leave you less than a foot tall. The main problem was everyone else, your Mom will flip when she see's you, possibly even enter one of her moods. Taylor will definitely mess around and callously talk about torturing you. Alexis might act worried or mean, you didn't really have a good read on her.

And that was just at home, school....good god rumors will spread. It's even possible another sick person will try and kill you to see if it works. Ashlei's little experiment was giving you nothing but problems.

Possibly worst of all was that in a few moments you would arrive at Ashlei's home, the home of a girl who loves the idea of a shrunken guy. Now that was a nightmare waiting to happen.
11223122212.title: A walk with your shooter

112231222121.content:
I was walking ahead without knowing what was going on behind me but before I could react, the sound of a gun shoot echoed throughout the area. I looked back and saw that Ashei with a gun in hand aiming towards me with a creepy grin on her face. "Sorry...my hand slipped...I didn't mean it?" she said as I noticed something warm was running my chest.

I looked down and saw the hole where the bullet left. Feeling light headed, I looked at her and said, "You...you bitch" With that I passed out. It was only a few minutes but to me it felt like hours since the darkness swollow me. Once again I saw the same light as last time and once again, before I had the chance to reach for it.

I felt a sharp sting on my left cheek and on the other. Each passing moment, the stinging was getting more and more painful till all of a sudden I opened my eyes. I shot up with a deep gasp of air and shouted, "The FUCK!" I looked up and saw Ashie on her kneels looking at me with a very creepy smile.

"I never get tired of that" she said as she stood up. "Wha...why the fuck did you shot me for?" I shouted as I stood up. "I said I didn't mean it, the trigger went off" she answered as she carried on walking. "Went off, didn't mean it? I saw that look on your face" I snapped as I chased after her. "Oh hush now...I swair that it will be the last time I have the gun out" said Ashei as she held her hands up.

"Okay then" I said as I looked down at the floor taking a deep breath. Ashei looked at me as if she loved the sight of me now even more smaller. Dammit, what it lately. Ever since mom sent me outside I became a magnet to anything that ends up with me dying and of course getting smaller. I was getting sick of it.

Seeing as how I lost six inches before the second shot, I fear as to how small I have become. Looking up at Ashei, I could tell that it is a lot as to when I first saw her today it was just the bottom of her chin and now it's just a few inches below that! I just hope that nothing bad happen to me when we enter her house which I could see is just a few feet away from us.

As Ashei stood up towards the front door and unlocked it so the that the two of us would enter. "Mom I'm home!" shouted Ashei as she dropped her bag onto the hallway. As I walked in, hoping for a reply but to horror, it was silent. Alone within the house with the girl that have just shot me in twice with only a few minutes ago.

I don't really have to say it, I felt really sick, so sick that I couldn't even stand up any more. "Hay are you all right?" asked Ashei as she was trying to sound worried but deep down I knew she wasn't. "I'm fine...I'm fine, just need to sit down" I answered as she lead me to the living room. As I crashed onto a sofa, Ashei left to get me something to drink.

When she came back she held a glasses with what I could tell as it being water, as I took the glass from her to began to drink it. As I was drinking, I couldn't help but noticed the way Ashei was looking at me. It was making me feel worried. As I finished drinking, Ashei took the glass away and left to the kitchen.

As I sat there, I couldn't help but noticed that the water I just drank tasted different somehow...with this my mind was beginning to panic as I have no idea what is to come, did she just gave me normal water or did she put something in it...
