1122312221212.content:
I lay on the couch relaxing as Ashlei put my glass into the dishwasher. Suddenly I felt a cramping pain in my stomach and let out a soft moan. I saw Ashlei looking at me from the Kitchen. "Everything alright?" she asked. "What the FUCK!" I yelled, "You put something in my water!" Ashlei walked back into the room and stood in front of the couch, with her hands on her knees so that I could see her deep clevage down the front of her shirt.

"You know," she pouted "you should be nicer to a girl that is bigger than you. You are awfully suspicious." I felt the cramps in my stomach subside for a moment. "I know..." I said, "but you did just shoot me you know. Sorry, I'm a little paranoid I guess." Ashlei smiled. "Yes a girl that is bigger than you and about to get even bigger..." My eyes went wide. "You bitch!" I said, standing up to push Ashlei. Ashlei moved a little but she was definately a little stronger than me. I wrapped my arms around her waist trying to push her down. I felt her soft breasts mashing into my face which was slick with sweat. The room started to get blurry. "Oh come on" said Ashlei, "I know you like tall girls... and you must know by now I like .. hmm... small men." The world became gray and then black and then for a moment there was nothing.

The next thing I knew, I felt something firm against my face and realized I was pressed up against Ashlei's stomach! I must have lost almost an entire foot! How the hell was I going to explain this! I felt a rush of panic and I stumbled backwards. Ashlei was a lot bigger than me now but I had to remind myself that she wasn't any bigger, I had shunk. I felt tears well up in my eyes as I thought about how difficult my life would be now. "Awwwwwwwwww, there there, little guy." said Ashlei "I won't do it again, I promise." she said. She sounded very sincere, but should I believe her after what she already did to me twice?

"Tell you what," she said, "why don't we go up to my room? We can play a videogame and it will get your mind off of it." I thought about it. "Well... okay." I said. We went upstairs and went into Ashlei's room. Her room was had pastel pink walls, a queen sized bed next to the door, and a TV against the wall opposite the bed. Ashlei turned on her XBOx 360 and came and sat down so she was leaning against the bed and I went over and sat down next to her. As I sat next to her I felt like a small child. She was a little over a head taller than me, sitting down! "Here" she said, handing me a controller. There was a racing game in the machine and we played for a little while.

After playing for about fifteen minutes, I felt a sharp pain in my stomach. I winced. "Something wrong, little guy?" Ashlei asked, turning so her breast rubbed against my shoulder. I looked into her pretty blue eyes, for a moment I felt turned on by this hot, pretty asian girl before my stomach twinged again. "D...do you remember the bullet?" I said, "How it stayed inside of me after I died? Well... what if ... what if the poison stayed inside of me too?" Ashlei stared at me for a moment. "Oh no, that's awful!" she said, her eyes registering shock... or was it excitement?
1122312221212.title: Something in it

11223122212122.content:
Ashlei sprinted out of the room while I rolled on the floor. A minute later she ran back into the room with a black bottle and a spoon. She sat down next to me and pulled me so that my head was laying on her lap. "Here," she said, "drink this! It will make you throw up and get all the poison out!" Overcome with gratitude, I watched as she carefully poured some of the deep purple liquid into spoon. I open my mouth wide, squinting my eyes as she jammed the spoon with the foul tasting liquid into my mouth. I swallowed, panting. "Thanks, Ashlei." I said, "that was a close one. Who knows how small I would have gotten?" This thought seemed to intrigue Ashlei. "Hmm... I don't know, I wonder how small you could get?" she said. She held her thumb and forefinger up as if measuring the height of an imaginary tiny man. She held them about three inches apart. "This tiny?" she asked, peering at me with her pretty blue eyes. I gulped, hard. "THIS tiny?" she said, narrowing her fingers so that there was about an inch between them... she smiled at me and the look of abject horror which must have been on my face. "Or... smaller?" she said, narrowing her fingers slowly, staring hungrily at the gap between them until they were pinched together. 12211121211.content:
It’s humiliating, hard and nerve-racking, but you really wish that you had just agreed to do whatever your mother asked earlier and saved yourself a death and beating. Painting your mother’s toes has always been a pain in your ass, her feet smell and it’s a lot of work, but you’d rather be painting her toe nails then being crushed underneath them. You stare up past your mom’s nails to see her looking down at you with fire in her eyes. She was sitting back in bed, legs crossed and waiting for you to get started. You had hopped that sitting back and relaxing would have made your mother cool down and stop being such an evil bitch. No such luck.

“Hurry up! I need this done in half an hour,” she hisses and you fight back an angry retort. You’re going to shut up, do your job and get out of her before you die again today.

Grabbing onto the tiny brush, which takes two hands to hold, you dip it in bright pink nail polish and lumber towards your mom’s toes. Her smallest toe is half your size, making it the easiest to get started on. Slowly lowering the brush, you gag at the thick aroma of feet a few inches away. If your mom wants to get ready for her date, she should think about washing her feet, not getting her toes painted. Holding your breath you start painting.

Things go pretty well as you move from toe to toe. Our mom barks out orders to hurry up and you follow them. You can tell the evil bitch loves this from the broad, cruel grin on her face as you shuffle around her toes. You’d love to get into her head when she’s crazy like this, understand her obsession with punishing you with her feet. It seems like whenever her evil side takes root, mom likes to feel you squirm under her big, smelly foot. It’s pretty horrible, the smell and feel of the smooth bottom of her foot on top of you. It was bad when you were a few feet tall, but now that your half the size of Barbie, you are literally smothered under her foul foot. You hated your mom’s feet, but it wasn’t the worse weapon in her arsenal. When your mom started employing other parts of her body, parts that you stared at on other women, you not only were beaten and humiliated, but you felt a sense of wrongness that made you feel sick.

Your mother’s toes wiggle, nearly hitting you in the face. You move back before your hit or dragged under the squirming digits, nearly dropping the brush as you back off. “I’m waiting. If you aren’t done soon, you’ll regret it.”

Your mother’s vague threat is enough to make you turn things up a notch. Your work gets sloppy, but as long as your mom doesn’t notice you don’t care. The job needs to be done or your mom was going to literally kill you and you weren’t sure how small you’d be then.

122111212111111.content:
Helpless under your mother’s toenail, you remain crotched so your head doesn’t hit the bottom of her heavy nail and wait for this nightmare to be over. It’s finally happened to you, you’ve died so much that now you are not even as big as a crumb. Your mom warned you this would happen with your daredevil antics, but it turned out that she ended up being the reason for your loss of height.

Time moves slowly for you, as you remained trapped between your mother’s big toe and her toenail. Everything shakes when your mother steps, bouncing you around under her nail and making this even more uncomfortable. It’s broiling in her show, making you sweat heavily and feel woozy. What nearly knocks you out though is the smell of her feet all around you. It’s enough to make your stomach turn and your eyes water. You hate feet and being trapped in one was terrible. It could have been worse though, your mom could have stuck you to that glob of toe jam that you had noticed while painting her nails. It depresses you even more to think that there are worst things that you mom could do to you.

The boredom begins to get to you after a few hours of nothing, not even movement from your mom’s feet. Her date must be going well if she hasn’t stomped off yet, but that isn’t what your mind wanders to now. What you can’t escape is the newfound danger your life is in now that you’re nothing but a bug. You had been getting smaller your whole life, but now you were truly tiny. There were no kids cloths that could fit you and you might as well forgetting about your social life, no girl wants to date a boy that can substitute for toe lint. Not to mention the odds of you dying again and getting even smaller were huge. You think about everyone in your life and how they’ll treat you now that you can fit under their nails.

Your mother was your biggest concern of course. Usually when she got angry you just left the house until she cooled off. That was no longer an option with the distance from your room to the front door being measured in miles. Your oldest sister Alexis might not abuse you at your new size, but you’re sure your younger sister Taylor will make your life hell. Your crazy goth sister will make sure that underfoot for the rest of your life if she ever got a chance. Now that you can be killed with no difficulty, you expect Taylor will be wearing her stomping boots from now on. You can’t know how you’re friends will react, but you can imagine amusement and disgust from them. It’s all so much to take in and you’ve only been this size for a few hours. What is life going to be like now that you’ll be spending the rest of it this size or smaller.

Everything starts shaking again, your mother’s on the move. You try to judge what’s going on from her footsteps, maybe try and tell if she’s stomping her feet in anger or walking leisurely. But every step she takes feels the same to you. Things slow down again as your mom drives, leaving you once again to worry about an uncertain future. Things have started to get clammy as sweat begins to seep in under your mom’s nails. The pink, soft flesh under her nail is becoming sticky, making it even harder to move. Your legs are glued to the hot, sweaty flesh, adding to your discomfort. A thought enters your mind, not about future dangers, but current ones; what if you get stuck under your mom’s toenail?

The thought of being stuck under her thick, hard toenail any longer the necessary makes you want to throw up. You try to peel your legs off the sticky flesh, but they remain stuck. Without any warning, her foot crashed down. You closed your eyes, expecting it to come down on you, but nay, something closer. You slowly opened your eyes to see the wall of Trish's shoe treads right beside you, twisting a bit to snuff out her cigarette. With a "Whew!" You sighed in relief, only to pale at what came next.

"Hmm, y'know what?" Trish boomed from high above, hands on her hips as she fondly gazed down towards you, eyes still alive with malice and predatory ambition, making you shiver a bit under her glare.

"...I wanna see just how small I can make you."

"..." You paused to blink and try to take in her words just as she instantly shoved her right foot forward, the toe of her shoe bumping into you roughly, sending a sudden pain into your chest and knocking the breath out of you as you fell backwards onto the flat of your back, holding your torso, wincing. You felt like she cracked something. She'd do more than just that as she lifted up her shoe, the sole of it filling your sky and casting an ominous shadow that no doubt sealed your fate.

You tried to get back up and run, but the shooting pain in your chest said otherwise. Quicker than you could blink, Trish's laughter filled your ears as her shoe came back down with a mighty stomp, flattening you underneath into the ground, bones cracking, body crushed. At least it was quick, little to no pain as the darkness overtook you. Unfortunately, you knew this was not the end as you could actually feel yourself begin to diminish once more.
1241212.title: Stomped Smaller

choices: Her thumb blots out the sky, she's not done yet.
12412122.content:
Once, twice, three, four, honestly Luke had lost count as his vision would begin to blur. He feeling his body continue to simply diminish, losing size with each stomp of her massive sneaker which only seemed to get bigger and bigger before his very eyes. The nearly unheard rumble of her booming stomps slowly growing in volume.Boom Boom Boom Boom BOOM!, the ground only continued to quake more and more as each one simply pushed you further and further into the ground. Her shoes becoming far more than buildings near skyscrapers which smaller buildings could fit in between the treads of. Finally and perhaps mercifully, Luke would feel that cold darkness embrace him once more as he would pass out.

Although he knew this was not the end, even as he slipped out of consciousness, it would never be the end for him until he perhaps shrunk down into nothingness. Though was there a limit to just how small he could go before reality had enough? As he would open his eye's shortly after, he wandered if this would truly be put to the test. Eye's fluttering open, the fogginess of him slipping back from being unconscious was slowly fading away and yet even as it did, he would still feel lost. The terrain he found himself on was rigid, a familiar color which he couldn't quite put his finger on. Massive ruts deeper than her was tall surrounded him for as far as he could see. Above him, a large structure jutted out ever so finely, almost like an awning which cast a darkness upon this land, making it harder to see.

As Luke would turn around, he would notice that this place had a sun, a huge black sphere which looked more like an abyss, somehow casting an emerald green sky around it which took up the entirety of his vision. The green part of the sky which held such minute details that it looked alien to Luke who simply couldn't help but try and figure out where he was. "Man you're fuckin' tiny." Dropping to his knees and covering his ears. Luke's thought would immediately be crushed by this sound, this all encompassing sound which rumbled the area and including himself. It causing him great pain to even try to withstand it, let alone make out what it was. Though, as it would end, and as he thought he could here the remnants of...words. It would all seem to click with him.

The memory of what had happened before he had passed out, Trish Pierce. The delinquent at his school which stole him from his friend Diana. Promptly crushing him in front of her without even really knowing he'd survive it. Only to then proceed to test and see just how small she could make him as she repeatedly stomped him into the ground over and over. Very slowly Luke began to realize just what this landscape was. Looking around again, mouth open, his bottom lip quivering as he wanted to scream. This landscape, the color he had found familiar, was a flesh color. The ruts in this ground which surrounded the entire area, they weren't ruts at all. They were prints, a pattern of sorts. That monolithic structure in the air, it was a damn nail attached to a damn finger. Luke was hopelessly lost on the tip of Trish's index finger...or was he?

Slowly, he would turn around,s tumbling and falling back to his ass as he did. He would look up to the sky once more. Letting out an angry cry as he realized just what it was. That black sun, it was her fucking pupil, and what he assumed was the sky for this place, was the iris of her emerald green eyes. She was looking right at him! Judging by the words of rather what he could make out, it seemed as if she had saw him too, or at least the insignificant speak of dust which she assumed was him.
12412122.title: Massive Punk

choices: "Into my shoe you go, hope you like feet."
"You'll probably like my cleavage as much as I like you in it."
124121222.content:
While you only tried to fathom and take in this terrible new world and size you found yourself living in, the sound ropes straining and light booms in the distance alerted your ears to the newly formed sounds that filled the air. In reality, this was only just Trish smirking as she gazed down at your pitifully puny stature sitting right on her fingertip. Every motion of hers, no matter how miniscule, was vast and powerful, like an act of god. She had realized this herself not too long ago, actually a literal goddess to you now, your very life hanging on her words and actions.

"Man, I really did make you so fuckin' tiny." She enunciated, every syllable threatening to blow out your ears with the sheer magnitude of her crashing words. "Huh...kinda fun actually. Might actually make you even smaller later. Wouldn't even have to try too hard, just a little pop from one of my fingers, or I could just drop you and let you fall all those miles below. Naw...might lose you then." She grinned a toothy, shark's grin. Glad you couldn't see it, or a shiver would have been sent down your spine.

"I'm pretty much god to you now, speck." She bellowed in laughter, forcing you to cringe and cover your ears, not like it did any good. "I'll do whatever I want with you, and not a thing you, or anybody else can do about it. Oh, wish I could do this to everyone." Trish momentarily closed her eyes to imagine towering over the whole world with everyone as insignificant dust specks, sending a sheer wall of flesh over the sky that was her pupil and iris, generating more booms for you. Guess everything would make a varying boom sound from now on.

Once her fantasy was over, she opened her eyes back up to go back to glaring at you. "Now, what should I do?" She mused to herself. Her two lackeys seemed to not have come back, either still chasing your friend away or the punk girl dismissed them to have time alone with you, her now little speck to play with and torture as she pleased. "A god deserves worship so..."
124121222.title: Hail to the Giga Punk

choices: Trish's Sock covered foot entering the shoe.
Trish's smirking face looking in at him.
1241212221.content:
"Back in the days of old, there was a way that devotion and worship was given, by bowing before them, at their feet to acknowledge them as the deities they were." Trish's voice was both arrogant and quite firm, showing little Luke that she was quite serious and reveling in her power, it perhaps going to her head a bit. This young woman who couldn't help but showcase a grin on her face, mouth opening up to showcase teeth which to him could easily crush skyscrapers between them. Luke, the once proud, and to a lesser degree of arrogant to this girl, daredevil that he once claimed to be, was simply put defeated. He couldn't look up with that confident smile, he couldn't challenge her to anything. The power she held over him, her fingertip within itself a large city to him, her face the entirety of her sky, and he couldn't even see anything aside her eye as she held him close. He nearly too minute to even be seen by her.

The way that she chuckled, both shook him physically and mentally, leaving him to wonder just what was on this devious punk's mind, knowing that it was far from good. "Unfortunately, I doubt very much I could see you on the ground before me." She would only scoff, laughing at just how small and powerless he was before her. "For very fuckin' pathetic." It really was a miracle that he didn't reduce based off of these verbal insults which she continued to throw at him. Although, judging by how much power her voice had on him now, if he got much smaller, it may very well come to that point, where even the rumble of her voice could make him smaller. Wasn't that a thought, merely the act of speaking would put enough strain to shrink him further, it one which Luke would have to shake from his head to try and not think about it, not wanting to feel any lower than what she already made him feel.

"I suppose what needs to be done, so that even someone as miserable as you can show the proper respect to someone like me, you're Goddess. You'll just have to spend some time under the feet which you can no longer bow before." Licking her lips, Trish would hungrily eye her victim up. She feeling her heart race at the thought, once more feeling those feelings, those desires to have everyone this powerless before her. How very much such she wanted, no demanded for it to become a reality. Yet alas, this would not happen, causing a tinge of anger to well up inside her, causing a bitter feelings which would only be remedied by abusing her power over this one minute speck. "Oh I'm goin' to enjoy this, hope you like my feet bug boy, then again, who fuckin' cares. You're too small to have an opinion anyways." She would only laugh at this sentence as she lifted her right foot up behind her, taking her foot into her free hand to that she could remove this piece of footwear. Her old beaten up DC's which had seen many years of use and collected a lot of sweat.

Of course, her actions to Luke were simply invisible as these things may have just been happening on another planet to him, but if he could have seen her face. He would have seen her make a mock face of disgust as she ripped her shoe off, as if being hit with something she didn't like. "Man, smell that you little insect? It smells like your new home already, time to move in and get on with the worship." Without much else to say, having surely broken this man down mentally with her words alone. Trish would simply move her finger for the opening of the shoe, being careful to not simply drop him in, not wanting him to reduce any further until she grew tired of him at this size. Very slowly and gently, she would lower her finger to the sole of her shoe, even to her, a sole which was damp to the touch from her days use of these sneakers. The worn number neat the heel practically blurred out, her socks stained with the coloring of the fabric. Of course, even with her gentle care, things were not any more of a cake walk for Luke.

Even before he had gotten remotely close to those shoes, his nostrils would be assaulted with the smell, his body hit with the built up heat from Trish's use. Closer and closer he would get and these things would only get worse, it not being until he passed through the opening of the shoe. He being lowered into the dark abyss that he would also be hit with the moisture from inside, her sweat which lingered in the air. So thick, and musky that he swore he would simply suffocate then and there. His vision would blur, his mind would fog, he wouldn't even remember being rolled off her fingertip, he lying a coughing and wheezing fit on the sole of her shoe. His skin beginning to burn as if he were in an oven. It wouldn't be too much longer before a shadow overtook him, something blocking out the light from the mouth of that shoe. Having little choice, he would turn his attention from his weakening form up to see?
1241212221.title: Into Trish's Shoe

choices: Trish heads home to let the torture continue
She actually has a MMA match to get to
12412122211.content:
A powerful rumble shook the world that was the inside of Trish's shoe, momentarily relieving you of the heat and humidity of it, a vast and powerful movement from the titaness above dissipating the 'weather' to you with such an action. Unfortunately it came back in full force once the shadow looming over you only grew closer and closer. You turned around slowly to an inaudible roar that only grew louder and louder until your ears felt like popping dozens of times over.

High, high above, a sky of dirty fabric greeted you, vaguely outlined in the shape of a colossal foot miles and miles massive so eager to feel your dust-speck form underneath it. Chunks of lint and dirt comparable to landmasses crashed down as the sock-clad foot of Trish slowly came into her shoe. With the appearance of her foot, the heat and stench had all but doubled, rendering you helplessly immobile as you wheezed to fill your lungs with fresh air and scrambled to try and at least get away from unbearable heat.

A set of booms came slowly after another. First, far off in the distance, the heel of her foot slammed down into the bed of the shoe, sending a quake that you hardly noticed through your pained senses. The punk goddess began to lower parts of her foot piece by piece, now the inner portion of her foot, then the ball of it, until finally her toes hovered just above you, wiggling so readily in anticipation. You had no diea how she could even get any pleasure from this, but she was known to love torturing those smaller and weaker than her, and what about you? At your now microscopic height, you were the smallest and weakest of all.

"Enjoy the ride speck." Trish thundered high above with an ear-splitting voice. Finally, her toes began to lower likes some great oncoming walls of the apocalypse. You gazed up weakly just as a fabric strand of her wet, sweat-filled sock smacked down heavily onto you, pinning you heavily to the bottom inside of her shoe, face meeting shoe bed painfully as you were forced to breath in more of her foot stench to the point of almost passing out.

"Ah, there we go." She thundered, giving her foot another test wiggle into her shoe before feeling it firm enough. You were plastered somewhere deeply in the regions between her big and second toe, only saved by the soft moistness of her sock. Had Trish not worn her shoes so much or had such a dirty sock on, you might have been crushed and reduced to an even smaller size.

You sighed, but gagged as your entire mouth was filled with the taste of foot. A day that was supposed to be a fun time at the beach with your friend had turned into quite the disaster. You just hoped you could make it out alive, and hopefully not any more puny than you have to be.

Another vast rumble filled the air as you felt a sense of weightlessness. Trish must have lifted her foot, only for a half second later to feel the entire world tremble as she slammed her foot down, rattling your bones and filling your whole body with a sense of pain and soreness. Yup, this ride within Trish's shoe would be a long, agonizing one.
12412122211.title: Trish's Sock covered foot entering the shoe.

choices: Her sports bra, you're coming along and being her 'lucky charm' for the fight
Her water bottle, she's thirsty and still feels like torturing you
124121222112.content:
Every cataclysmic step of Trish's slamming shoe was agonizing torture in the grandest of scale. Her monolithic weight pressing down on you with every stomp, spared only because of the circumstances of your surroundings and size. High, high above, Trish smirked as she walked down the sidewalk, hands in jean pocket as she relished every moment of having a microscopic mite inside her shoe, wiggling her toes every so often and wondering what was going on down there. Despite her rough actions and rude personality, she could be quite imaginative if she wanted to, and an image popped into her head of a sky entirely made of her sock smothering the pathetic speck, making her shiver a bit in pleasure and power. The punkette licked her lips at the thought, a habit she had formed from whenever she saw or got something she wanted.

This continued on for an indefinite amount of time for you. All you knew was the darkness, the pain, and the smell overriding your senses. It either went on for an eternity, or a rough couple of minutes. You really couldn't tell, only knew that you had to endure it. There must be something beyond this. Trish just can't keep you inside her shoe forever, she had to remove her foot. If you were recuperated enough by then, you would try to cling to her sock for a free ride out. If not, you hoped that the gigantic punk goddess would remember you and pluck you out.

Outside of the prison of Trish's shoe-world, you could faintly hear muffled tones and spoken words, all inaudible at the moment with a foot comparable to a continent resting right on top of you. You doubt you even wanted to hear the words of the titans above anyway, their voices probably loud enough to blow out your eardrums. For know, you would simply endure and try your best not to succumb to unconsciousness.

---

"Hey Trish, rooting for ya in the fight tonight." A gruff voice called out to her.

"Thanks coach, but you already know I'm going to win." She replied with a wide smirk on her face, walking past a heavyset man who was smoking, making him chuckle and wheeze. He, her coach, was partly the reason she started smoking, that and to have something to do other than pound faces into the dirt. She stepped into a locker room, empty save for herself, and sat down at a nearby bench, starting to remove her shoes. First, the one without the mite in it just to draw it out and make him suffer even more.

She sighed in relief as she kicked off the shoe and peeled her sock from her foot, wiggling it barely now that it was free and in the open air. For the shoe with the speck, she decided just to make it slow. Almost in painstakingly slow-motion, Trish untied her laces, and after a few moments of waiting and acting like the strands were now in the right place, she began to remove her foot.

---

Another earth-shattering rumble filled the area, alerting you to the fact that at least something was happening. Far off in the distance, a great weight was taken off as Trish's heel lifted up from the bed of the footwear, soon followed by the rest of her socked foot, allowing a stream of cool air and light to filter into the inside of the shoe. You painfully worked up enough energy to stand up and cough, stretching your body to try and remove the feeling of soreness from your whole body. This was it, almost a chance at hope and relief, until another massive shadow fell over you.

You yelped in fear as a landscape all its own plucked you up, carrying you a great and vast distance once again only to see an entire black sky before you, outlined in color. Trish's eye gazed down at you on her fingertip once again, a glint of sadistic glee in the predator's glare of hers. She wetly licked her lips once again, a wet sound almost akin to a tsunami wave crashing in the far distance to you.

"Hey you fuckin' mite, how'd you enjoy my shoe?" She chuckled deeply. "I enjoyed it, feeling you at my feet. A goddess can get used to this." The sound of a metallic crash echoed in the distance, and you looked behind you. Far, far away, enough to be blur but not so much that you couldn't make it out, Trish's free hand opened a sheer wall of grey. You squinted your eyes, recognizing it as a locker door. Were you in a locker room of some kind? Just how far had Trish carried you from that alleyway she had mercilessly shrunk you in?

"Unfortunately, I can't toy with personally until later. I gotta big fight tonight, something that'll put my name out there in the fighting world. Heh, to you, it'll be a literal clash of the titans." She laughed a bit at her own joke, making you roll your eyes and sigh. Glad you were too tiny for her to even see that from you. A few more vast movements, and Trish had stood up, lowering her finger down to the bench she had sat on, dropping you by tilting her finger roughly, your small form hitting a wooden landscape and luckily not falling into the miniscule crevices in the wood only you could see.

Towering above higher than anything else you could compare to, Trish loomed like some true titanic colossus from out of some myth, her godlike form blurring the more you stared upwards. "Now, don't get any ideas mite, you're lucky I don't crush you right away." She thundered from on high, making you wonder what she meant. "But if I catch you looking," She raised her foot and slammed it down to generate a massive quake that knocked you flat on your back. She didn't have to say anything more, you got the message.

With more thunderous sounds, Trish slowly began to...undress. Sure, you couldn't make out everything about her, but you knew enough of what was going on. First her tight jeans, then her shirt. Following her orders, you turned and dare not look, even though she couldn't possibly know if you were staring at her or not, given the vast size difference. Still, had to just to make sure, didn't want to be even smaller than you already were. You gulped at just how much bigger she could get to you, escalated to a galactic height.

"Done, feels good to be in the fighting gear again." Trish said. You turned around, and noted she was in much different garb now. A pair of tight spandex shorts fit snugly round her, a matching black sports bra round her chest, showing off her well-formed and chiseled physique, scrapper and a fighter in her essence. Once again, her monumental fingers came down towards you, picking you up not even in the gentlest of manner. You didn't know what would happen next, but it appeared she was sending you into...
124121222112.title: She actually has a MMA match to get to

choices: The fight killed you dozens of times, shrinking you smaller than ever
In the chaos of the fight you ended up on yourself on Trish's opponent's towel.
1241212221121.content:
...her sports bra. If you hadn't seen it from countless miles away you wouldn't have been able to comprehend what this location was. In seconds Trish took you from a planetary bench to what felt like another planet. Black and tan as far as the eyes could see. A mere inch of Trish's bosom occupied all your senses and blinded you from the rest of the world. You couldn't even distinguish anything above you. It had to have been Trish's face smirking down at you but it went on for such a distance the sky was an incomprehensible tan. It had to have been her chin, with her lips being continents away.

Painful noises make your ears cry out in agony. Trish was saying something but you were so close to her face and she was so big it didn't seem remotely like speech, just indescribably loud sounds. It was amazing you weren't deaf yet, though you wish you were. Trish's fingers moved you closer to the infinite blackness of her sports bra. You saw another massive finger pull it open slightly before you were roughly dropped in. Mercifully your landing was soft, but you were now trapped in the pitch black realm of a sports bra. Despite being as tight as possible to hold in her bosom you could spy above you a tiny sliver of light you could escape from...if you could climb a hundred or so miles. Still, it was worth a shot. You began your long climb when the entire moon you rested on seemed to move. It wasn't certain but it felt like you were going up by...a lot of miles. The gentle wind of Trish's chest moving upwards maybe an inch at most slammed you mercilessly deeper into her bra. Another infinitely loud sound came from an immense distance below then it hit you: she took a step. With a single step Trish sent you dozens of miles backwards, deeper into her bra. It was clear now you weren't going anywhere.

-----

"Hope you're ready bug. This is a really important match so I'll need all the support I can get." Trish grinned as she placed her speck between her bra and boob. "Make sure to worship me nice and good now. Or else." Full of confident swagger she took her first step out of the room, focused on how her speck reacted. She didn't care how many times he'd die during this little bout. She just wanted to see if she could feel his tiny body flail around her sports bra with every step. As it turned out: she could. She could only imagine the hell he was about to go through. How small would he get? A single punch to her chest would almost surely kill him a dozen times over. Maybe he'd get lucky if her other boob took most of the damage but fat chance of that. She was going to fight like there wasn't anything different about today, and whatever happened to her bug was going to happen.

"Hope he doesn't get so small I'll never find him. That'd be a shame." Trish laughed.

"Then again, he'd get to spend the rest of his life worshiping and living off of me. There are worse ways to go." She cackled again, heading out of the locker room.

Roaring cheers awaited her outside. For her big, career-determining fight the seats were all filled to the brim with people ready to see two women savagely beat the daylights out of each other. Outside the ring the coaches sat on opposite ends. Trish headed to her end silently, occasionally pumping the crowd up. Her opponent glared from inside the ring: an admittedly intimidating-looking six-foot tall woman ripped with muscles.

Not a Goddess like me though.

Trish began to climb into the ring, faintly aware of her coach offering some encouragement. She took her position across from her opponent with a referee between them.

"Okay I want a clean fight. No biting, no cheapshots." He glared at Trish as he said that. "Is that clear? Shake hands and get ready to start."

The woman stuck out her hand for Trish, she smacked it away. "Save it for your girlfriend Tiny."

Enraged, the woman pulled her hand back and got into a fighting stance, much like Trish did. The Ref and crowd joined together for a last five-second countdown. When it came time for the bell both girl's lunged at the other with all their might. The woman was the first to make her move. With surprising agility her fist barreled right for Trish's chest. Fast as it was though she knew she could both take it and dodge it with ease. She almost did too, then she remembered her new slave. With that she took the blow and jumped back. Adrenaline blinded her senses of whatever happened to the man on her chest but Trish couldn't care less. She grinned confidently.

"This is going to be easy."

-----

What the fuck was going on?

You couldn't tell anymore. Everything was pitch black and louder than anything you'd ever heard before. You were fairly certain an eardrum popped with the other not too far behind. The volume of the world alone was enough to completely cripple any notion you had of trying to escape. You held yourself as tightly as you could against Trish's chest, hoping to blot out the sound. Under your breath were nothing but prayers for some kind of help. Your answer was what could only be described as a shock wave smacking you senseless. You didn't know what it was but considering where you were it seemed only logical Trish got hit. The blow narrowly missed the breast you were on and slammed into her other one but the hurricane's from it sent you spiraling into the air for miles, where you finally landed with a few cracked bones on another section of pitch-black breast. If not for the soft landing you would have certainly died from falling. Increasingly loud booms came from into the darkness. It took a moment before it hit you that this was Trish's heart pounding. It didn't matter, it was just another deafening noise on top of everything else. All you could make out in the chaos was one word Trish uttered.

"....Easy."

Then another whirlwind let you know she was on the offensive.

-----

This fight was a joke. Trish quickly realizing that moments after beginning her barrage. Despite her scary expression and height the woman she was fighting was a complete joke. Her punches were barely noticeable and with each blow she received from Trish she was notably staggered. She pissed Trish right off. Everything about her screamed things that made her mad. She was muscular but a glance could tell she didn't train like she should. Her features were all feminine and cared for like a girl who spent more time at a mirror than at a gym. It was painfully obvious this was a woman who was only in MMA because it was just a casual hobby she happened to be suited for. For Trish, who took it like her sole entertainment in life, it was an insult. So she didn't hold back.

This woman was getting wrecked. By the end of the first round Trish had her sweating bullets and dizzy, whereas she was only just getting warmed up. The woman's coach dabbed her with a towel and gave her water but she seemed unresponsive. Trish took a quick swig of water, pounded her fists and rushed to finish the job.

One final combo later it was done. The woman was on the ground and Trish was victorious. The referee grabbed her hand and cheered her on as the winner. The punk girl smiled at the crowds and raised her fists into the air. She screamed as loudly as she could in victory. Everyone was chanting her name. Much like her bug they were acknowledging her true greatness.

Speaking of the bug, she'd needed to check up on him. Once all the fervor started to die down Trish headed to the locker room to change. First things first: her sports bra came off and she looked for her favorite dirt speck.

"What the fuck?! Where is he?!"

He was nowhere to be seen.
1241212221121.title: Clash of the Titans

choices: Go home, and forget about him.
12412122211211.content:
Trish's victory would only be short lived as she freed her chest of the sports bra which she had left her newest toy in. A woman who wore nothing but a predatory on grin on her face as she stripped away her top, freeing her admittedly large assets to the air, she would feel that grin soon disappear from her face. It soon hardening into that of an annoyed glare as her green eye's pierced down onto her breasts, even taking great care to glance down into the dark abyss which was her cleavage to see if he had simply been hiding between her two fleshy mounds, though to no luck would that be. "What the fuck?" Trish would ask to herself, practically growling in frustration as she simply stood there, dumbfounded over what she saw, or perhaps the lack therefor of it.

Her experience as a Goddess was far too short lived for her liking, it had only been a few hours! The power she felt, the rush of having someone quite literally under her thumb. Luke in his special condition who had started off the day inches tall, had went to Microscopic in practically the span of ten minutes. A tingle flowing up her spine at the mere memory of that, as well as doing something to ease her anger over the situation. Still, all it did was make her yearn for more, to have more than just little Luke under her thumb, perhaps an entire metropolis, or maybe even more than that. A thought that practically made her salivate as it entered her mind, yet it also made itself known to be a double edged sword as it would only serve as a cruel reminder of that not being possible.

Although, still, there was her one soul which she absolutely ruled over, Luke. Whilst it annoyed her to not be able to see him with her eyes, to feel her as her body dominated him, and in some cased in that MMA match, also murdered him to decrease him no doubt to what he is now. There was still that thought of just how much power she still held over him, granted he was still on her body somewhere. After all, it wasn't as if Trish could prove it.....or could she? Naturally, as Trish went about getting dressed. Merely throwing a T-shirt on over her actual bra and a black zip up hooded jacket which sported a decal of her favorite metal band on the front of it. There was someone whom would also feel these actions, only on a much grander scale.

Eye's fluttering open, Luke would awake for an amount of times he couldn't even count anymore. His last few memories being the thunderous voice of Trish which had nearly deafened or even reduced him further from the closeness and sheer power of it due to their size difference. “How’s it going cousin?” You calmly call out as Rouge hovers over you like a pale mountain. Rouge either doesn’t hear you, or considers you not worth responding to because she remains silent. You crane your head back to see her face, but can’t see past her bulging chest. Yet, somehow you know there is a merciless smile plastered on her pretty face.

Her pouty lips are painted dark purple in the most sensual shade of lipstick. Eyeliner surrounds the most striking green eyes you’ve ever seen. And not a pimple or imperfection can be found on her whitish face. If she wasn’t your cousin and completely evil, you think you’d have liked to get to know her better, maybe even tried asking her out.

Rouge did nothing as she stared at you. She was lost in thought, which only worried you more. Rouge usually started humiliating and hurting you as soon as she saw you. If she was thinking about something, it wasn’t anything good for you. Just when the anticipation started getting to you, Rouge lets out a soft giggle. “No argument, you’re too big.”

“What did you say?” You hazarded to ask and get a death glare from Rouge. Still staring at you like death itself, she explains herself sweetly to you.

“You’re too big. I like that you’re smaller, but you’re still too big for my liking. I see you more like a flee, scurrying around at my feet like the pest you are. You’re small enough now to fit under my big toe, but I want you small enough to be smothered under my baby toe. That would be perfect.”

You stare in horror at Rouge as she explains why she’s going to kill you. The way she talks about putting you under her toes comes out sounding orgasmic. Thinking about torturing you is turning the crazy goth on. You open your mouth to reason with her. convince her that she needs to stop, that she’s crazy, but her fingers wrap around your body cutting off the flow of oxygen. Rouge starts pacing around, loosening her grip so you can breath, but still keep you from squirming.

“Now, how to do the deed. I can only crush you once at this size, so I had better make it good,” Rouge ponders out loud, studying your tiny face as she speaks. “I guess I could just crush him, he’d make such a nice mess under my boots or bear feet or even under another part of my body. I wonder how it feel to crush a undying bug under your butt or breasts.”

Your face twists into expressions of absolute horror at the thought of being crushed under Rouge’s body. Any part of her could kill you, there isn’t one part of her that would hurt you least. Whether it was boot, feet, butt or breast, you’d be pulverized instantly, unless Rouge did it slowly, which you didn’t even want to think about.

“Then again, crushing a bug is so run of the mill. Maybe I’ll try to be more inventive. There are so many ways to kill him, I might as well…. experiment.” Rouge looks down at you, pondering her technique to kill you. There is no contemplation on sparing you, only on how you die. You go even paler then Rouge as she tells you exactly what she’s going to do to you.

The roar from the heavens woke you as it always did, Goddess Sarah was awakening. The faint grumbles of her drowsy self were the morning sounds commanding you to awaken; you did so, like you did every day. A bit drowsy yourself, you continued to lay against your fuzzy bed, eyes locked onto the massive bed above which the Goddess you were married to rested on. The blankets as long as mountains rolled around to make way for her feet to dangle from the side, both bare soles loomed mere inches away from you. Her toes seemed to dance along the ground, searching for her morning slippers; or, as you called it, your bed. The black-painted toe managed to find the arch looming above; the Goddess began to slide her slipper on. You tensed at the familiar sight of her sole closing in, eventually just engulfing you in its massive size. It wasn’t a new feeling, the feeling of being walked on. You couldn’t remember when it started, but for the last few years it had been a daily occurrence. Unless Goddess Sarah stomped her foot you wouldn’t die, or at least, get smaller. That was how you got to be half an inch tall, instead of death you shrank. Eventually reaching this point, where you were so small Sarah’s divine foot couldn’t even crush you without her wanting to do so. Sure with each step a few bones cracked, maybe a wince of pain here or there, but it was for your Goddess so you took it amidst your silent worship of her foot. Your lips and tongue danced along her sole with the skill you once used in the Goddess’ actual mouth, back when you were actually considered a person. But that was a long time ago, now your only purpose was to please your Goddesses. Goddess Sarah, the one you married and swore eternal loyalty too, (Sub) Goddess Gwen, the Goddess you yourself helped to create and nurture, and (Sub) Goddess Rebecca, the youngest and most innocent of the Goddesses. Most would use the term family to describe them, but they were your Goddesses.

Beyond the realm of Sarah’s foot you could hear the clicking sound of the door; she must have arrived in the bathroom. Sure enough, her slipper soon came off with you still stuck to her foot. The sole pushed you against the tiled floor as her clothes came off; Goddess Sarah even hummed a tune as she was soon bare. You managed to catch a glimpse of her clothes as she kicked them out of the way, turning her attention to the bathtub. Each foot entered the tub, still moist from the last time it was used, and the Goddess turned the water on. You could hear the faint sounds of the rushing waves of water working their way through the pipes, soon coming out in a rain to clean Goddess Sarah’s form. It also doubled as your cleaning, as the water flowed back down the drain it danced along her soles, washing you along with her. She began to sing a little bit again to pass the time, you could hear her wet hair making sounds with each little movement of her head. It was a heavenly tune you couldn’t recall, you just recognized it from Goddess Sarah singing it so often. A bit of a smile crossed your lips with each syllable; you restarted your worship of the Goddess in harmony with the tune.

Not long after, the texture of the water changed, becoming more bubbly and sudsy; she must have begun to shampoo. That meant it was time for your job. Turning your head to the soapy water sliding along past you, you swallowed an entire mouthful. It tasted a big disgusting but over time you adjusted. With the mouthful of water you began to clean Goddess Sarah’s foot, the product may have been intended for hair but she found it also had a nice effect on her skin. It was your job to apply it to her soles each morning. It was a grueling task, there was always the threat of the water coming in a huge wave and drowning you, occasionally you chocked on the soap-filled water, but it was all for the beautiful Goddess Sarah. Not much later the shampooing was done, whatever you didn’t personally apply was already decorated amidst her sole by the water. Goddess Sarah showered for a little bit longer to remove any faint suds, but she soon turned off the water and stepped outside.

Next came the part you always hated, you tensed as the huge fibers of a towel rubbed all along Goddess Sarah’s foot. It was meant to dry her off but you always hated how itchy it felt. Thankfully it didn’t last long and Sarah moved to other parts of her body. Not long after you heard the hurricane that was her hair-dryer, that was your cue to begin some more worshipping. You didn’t have to, but you loved to make your Goddess of a Wife happy. Her sole was fresh with the taste of her strawberry shampoo, not the most gratifying taste but for her you’d do anything. You’d known Goddess Sarah for over 20 years now, but still the sight of her drew you breathless. So beautiful, such a prize among others, a Goddess among Goddesses. 1511221.content:
As the door opens and you look at the person behind it, you were shocked to find that he looked just like you! The only exceptions were his hair and eye colors being the exact opposite of yours. Although you had 'returned to your original height' once again stood at an even 6 feet tall (to this subatomic scale, anyway), this you seemed to have died at least once already. He only stood at 5 foot 6, a full half a foot shorter than you.

This subatomic version of you stared at you with the same confused shock as you did him. You and your double simply stared at eachother for what seemed like an eternity.Just then, a voice called out from inside the house. A very familiar voice.

"Honey, who's at the door?"

As you looked away from your double, you saw the source of the voice. Much to your surprise, the person whose voice you heard made her appearance known to you: It was Sarah! Although, much like the alternate you, this Sarah had different hair and eye colors from the one who had caused your presence here in the first place. Her hair was blond instead of brown, and her eyes were a brilliant shade of blue. As you saw this version of your former goddess, you immediately felt a wave of tenderness in her presence. It was more than obvious to you from just this brief moment of seeing her that her personality was the exact opposite of the devilish woman you had married in your own world. She, however, had the same reaction as the alternate you; she simply stared at you in shock.

After several more moments of staring at eachother in this awkward silence, Sarah spoke up again.

"Ummm, Honey? Did you have a twin brother that you never told me about?"

"No Sarah, I don't know who this person is..."

"Well... He must have some relation to you! He looks just like you! Why don't we invite him in for something to eat?"

You snap out of your trance as you hear this.

"Oh no, there's no need for that. I don't mean to impose on you."

The Sarah double simply smiled with a pure gentleness that was equal to the level of cruelty the old Sarah showed you.

"Nonsense. We're always happy to show some good old fashioned hospitality to anyone. Please, come in."

Grabbing you by the arm, she proceeded to eagerly pull you into the house. She then lead you to a table where she pulled out a chair to have you sit down. The alternate you simply watched as his wife got you settled in. He then shut the door and joined the two of you. Sarah then began talking to you.

"So, who exactly are you Mister? You look just like my little Luke over hear. Are you his long lost identical twin or something?"

"Ummm... No, not exactly anyway..."

"What do you mean 'not exactly'? Are you his cousin?"

"No, it's nothing like that... It's just... Well, you'd probably think that I was crazy if I told you..."

A broad smile appeared on Sarah's face, as if saying "Oh yeah? Try me." She then proceeded to speak to you again.

"I'm sure that I've seen something even crazier. Please, just tell me your story."

The identical double of yourself nodded in agreement.


What will you do now? Will you tell them the truth, or will you try to hide your true identity from them?

1512.content:
A gulp went down your throat. You didn’t want to shrink some more, but without that Goddess Sarah wouldn’t have her usual, beyond-perfect, look going on. And unfortunately, that sort of went hand in hand with worshipping her. She always demanded effectiveness, making her more beautiful and worshipping her at the same time was about as effective as it got. But…you didn’t want to shrink again…There was a faint hope that, after lessons with your Sub-Goddess, she’d be in a more lenient mood…maybe you wouldn’t have to shrink…

“If it’s okay my Goddess, I think our daughters’ tutelage comes first…” You whimpered slightly.

Goddess Sarah got a bit of a look in her eye, “You mean Goddesses. You became their pet long ago.” You bowed in apology, “S-Sorry my Goddess.”

“It is quite alright; let me just get them so we can prepare…

-----------------

About ten minutes later, Goddesses Sarah, Gwen, and Rebecca were in the living room, the Sub-Goddesses on the black couch against the wall, and Goddess Sarah on the recliner across from it. The TV sat on the wall between them, off. And of course, there was you, currently on the carpeted floor of the living room about ten meters away from the looming toes of your Goddess Wife. In the distance you could see your daughters, Gwen looking more than eager while wearing jean-shorts with a white shirt. Rebecca appeared much less interested, wearing a black mini-skirt and a red top. You noted the freshly purple-painted nails on Goddess Gwen, that task took you many hours the night before; Rebecca wore a pair of ankle-socks.

Your wife cleared her throat to gather attention, “Before I begin, I’d like to ask you girls something. Would you say our little toy has been well behaved lately?”

Rebecca gave a shrug, Gwen responded almost immediately. “Heck no! I asked him to paint my toes last night, it took him hours! And he didn’t apologize or anything!”

Maybe because I’m about an inch tall?

“He has been sort of lazy lately…” Rebecca nodded in agreement.

“I agree with you two; and to be frank, I feel like it’s because you two haven’t been properly punishing him.”

“Is that why we’re here?” Rebecca sounded like she was annoyed, Gwen’s expression got very eager very fast. She always loved seeing her mother punish you.

“That’s right. Let’s start by giving him a task…In fact, I have the perfect idea.” Before you could turn back to her, Sarah loomed her left foot over you, several specks of dirt from the floor rained down upon you. “Beg Luke, otherwise, I will crush you and make you even less than an insect. Beg for mercy from your Goddess.”

For a moment it seemed hard to believe what you heard, but the sole of Goddess Sarah’s foot moved closer and you knew she wasn’t bluffing. Thousands upon thousands of pounds of weight were coming for you, and you did not want that number to reach the millions. You fell to your knees, bowing before Goddess Sarah. “Please my Goddess!! Don’t crush me! I’ve done nothing but serve you loyally all these years!”

Sarah’s eyes twitched, “So you’re saying I’m wrong? Wrong words to say Luke.” Her foot began coming in faster.

Memories of the last time you got crushed came to mind, how inexplicably painful it was. You may have recovered minutes later, but the sheer memory of the pain was enough to haunt you for the entire month. Now you were even smaller, Goddess Sarah even bigger, and it was about to repeat itself. Tears welled up, the beautiful sole of your wife was inches away “Please my Goddess!! Have mercy! I’ll do anything! I’m yours body and soul!!!”

“Then obey me and die.” She responded coldly, her foot landed on you and the single second you were alive beneath it redefined hell in every meaning of the word. Faintly, Gwen’s gleeful chuckles were heard, as was Rebecca’s surprised gasp. You fluttered into unconsciousness…

----------------------

Meanwhile, Goddess Sarah propped her foot up to show her daughters the sight of their father/pet ingrained deep into her foot, growing smaller with the second. He shrank away to the point his body entered a wrinkle on her foot, the blood stain from crushing him soon became bigger than he was.

Rebecca was exasperated, “Why did you do that Mom? He was begging as best as he possibly could.”

Goddess Sarah wiggled her toes, “That’s why. I’m his Goddess, to him I’m as perfect as it gets. He should’ve welcomed a nice death beneath my foot. Instead of fought against it, so I crushed him. Rebecca and Gwen were equally surprised, “Wow…”

-----------------------

You awakened again, staring face to face with the perfect sole of Goddess Sarah, just in time to hear her explanation. You banged your head against her foot in frustration. Idiot!! You know she’s your Goddess. Why did you fight against her wishes? Ugh! Your frustrated head banging didn’t go unnoticed, “Now, since you’re awake Luke. Kiss my foot to start making up for this insult. Right as you heard “Kiss” you were already pampering your gigantic wife with affection, not just kissing either, you were licking, massaging, and even rubbing your face into the perfection that was Goddess Sarah.

Goddess Sarah smiled smugly, “And that’s how you properly punish him for misbehaving. Understand girls?” Rebecca and Gwen nodded. “Good…Now…perhaps our pet should worship us in apology for misbehaving?” They nodded again.

Before you knew it, you were before three pairs of toes the size of continents, kissing, licking, massaging, and bowing before all of them. Occasionally Goddess Gwen would poke you with her toes, Goddess Sarah would sometimes ask for you to lick a speck of dirt from a certain spot, and Goddess Rebecca…well she didn’t want to remove her socks, so you were licking the soles of her socks clean at the moment. The taste of their divine feet was about as good as you had it, and you were okay with that. About three hours later you finished, out of saliva and each Goddess kind-of satisfied.

They each rose and playfully raised their feet into the air, looming their soles over you. “Never forget this is where you belong tiny.” Goddess Sarah laughed. You bowed to them in response.

“What now?” Gwen asked aloud.

Sarah shrugged, “After this I suppose one of us can just toy with him for a little while…”

“I’ve been wanting to play with Daddy for a while now…” Rebecca muttered.

“I could use some help applying some makeup so I can visit some friends…” Gwen noted.

“And I still have some chores with him…”

“Hmm…” All three grunted in unison.

Eventually…it was decided…

155.content:
Her hand came down and picked you up gently, cradling your half-inch form in the palm of her hand. If she wanted to, your goddess could be quite loving, if you did everything she desired and wished to the most specific of details. But over your years as a bug/slave/pet, you had become quite accustomed to it all, almost instinct to do as your goddesses desired.

Whenever they wanted a massage or a kissing or a licking on any form of their body, you were their to do so. If they needed a good stress reliever, you were a perfect tiny little punching bag for them. Though you did not die, you believed they restrained themselves from doing so, not because they did not want to end you, but because they liked you at your current height. If they wanted you any smaller, they would step on you on a whim's notice. One time you were simply milling about and Sarah slammed her foot down without any warning, and had simply said "She wanted to see you tinier."

Not that you complained. You had been trained to love gazing up to them, no matter how much vaster and larger they became with each death, with each shrinking of yours. It only added to your awe, and instilled within you as a definite fact that these towering beings above were your deities, your divine goddesses to please and worship as a privilege no other had but yourself. Least, that's how you liked to think it. Something always tugged in the back of your mind though that this was all wrong, that you were a human being who didn't deserve any of this, who needed to treated with respect and compassion as much as any other despite the size difference.

That voice was normally shut out from fear of getting crushed or desire to love your goddess, which her voice rang through your ears right now.

"Now, we'll be having some company over today. Do you remember what to do?" She asked, arching an eyebrow as she gazed down judgingly to you in her palm.

"Yes, my goddess." You replied quickly, but not quickly enough so that it sounded forced or anything.

"....Repeat them to me."

"I am nothing. I am a toy, a treat, a pet, a slave, an insect to those vastly superior to me. I will follow every order, every action, every command to the highest degree I am capable of. If I do not, my punishment is just and I deserve it." You replied automatically, these words having been drilled into your head long ago.

Sarah smiled, reaching up with her free hand and gently tapping you on top of your head with her index finger. "Good little bug. You'll do just fine." She stated quite happily, making you sigh in relief. You were always worried that you did not please them enough with any of your actions or words.

"If I may be so bold to ask, goddess, but who is coming over, so that I might prepare myself for what to do?" You chirped up. Some of your goddesses had specifics that they liked you to have them do. Some preferred foot massages, others them teasing you. Some preferred oral worship, you shouting their names and praising them, while others relished the fact that you were pitifully small in their hands.

Sarah paused to think, but opened her mouth to speak. "It is..."

1552.content:
A moment of silence passed as you registered the booming words of your goddess, transferring them into sheer terror. Your entire self paled as the blood flushed from your face in fear. No...not Rouge. Any other goddess but her. The others could be gentle, they could be cruel if they wanted to be, but Goddess Rouge was on a whole other level. Just the mere thought of her sent a shudder down your spine and made you cringe at every painful thought and memory of her.

She was the reason you were half an inch tall right now. She seemed to relish torturing you, enjoyed every moment of reducing you, and no matter what you did, whether you pleased her or not, her actions always ended in pain for you. While the other goddesses and sub-goddesses did crush you on occasion to shrink you, no matter what Rouge was the one who ended up doing it the most, the sight of her massive boots coming down on you made you wince even at the thought.

You had been left in her care a few months ago, Goddess Sarah and the rest of your divine family going on a small trip that for some reason didn't require you to come along as well. With Rouge's lavish manor, you had seen her go from a gothic young woman to one of the wealthiest women in the whole country. Rumor had it was that she had been quite the gold-digger, and got her claws on a business CEO before he mysteriously 'left everything he owned' to his lovely wife. He promptly disappeared off the face of the map, and Rouge was never questioned, her charm and grace to the camera and paparazzi hiding her quite devilish nature.

Even though she had normal, human-sized servants who she no doubt treated like dirt, she had gotten you to do the most demeaning of tasks, which you were more than 'happy' to do for her, albeit a little forced on your part. You cleaned her boots with your tongue, bowed down before her and told her how powerful she was and how little you were, and even complimented everything she owned and what she could do. She had told you that you had done a good job, and as a reward would grant you an even better view of her. That was when she simply picked you up and flung you across the room to smack into a wall.

She strutted over happily to you before raising her boot, and simply brought it down, your body easily giving way underneath it. You went from three inches to half an inch from that, and had barely been hanging onto this small size, not wishing to be any smaller unless your goddesses wanted it. Fortunately, they haven't, but with Rouge coming over, it might happen anytime.

A knock from downstairs interrupted the horrid memory, and Sarah smiled down at you. "Ah, that must be her now." She got up, your small body still cupped in hand, and strutted out of her room, heading downstairs and opening the front door to greet the demon herself.

"Rouge, good to see you." Your wife-goddess smiled at the woman standing on the front porch, idly texting away on an incredibly expensive-looking cell phone.

"Sarah! Good to see you too." Rouge replied in a deep, seductive tone, the only setting her voice seemed to have. You peeked over Sarah's fingers to look at her, and still seemed the same as ever. She hadn't aged any, as if the forty-year old woman seemed blessed to appear eternally young with her good looks. Pale skin that seemed ghostly beautiful, hair died in streaks of purple curves that defied gravity, an H-cup chest and a rear enunciated only further by her tight, form fitting leather and dominatrix like outfit, always followed by her signature white boots.

"Oh?" Rouge looked down at you over her sunglasses, putting her cell phone away and smirking. "If it isn't my little cousin-bug. How are you?" She cooed almost mockingly.

"I-I'm fine. How are you, goddess Rouge?" You replied in a bit of a stutter.

"Oh, I've been fine. Busy running a multi-million dollar company can be so stressful at times, but I manage." She strutted in past Sarah, nearly knocking her aside. That was a thing too, Rouge always flaunting her wealth in anyone's face. You looked up, goddess Sarah narrowing her eyes a bit before forcing a smile on her face and closing the door behind her, noting the...limousine parked out on the front lawn.

Rouge sat her plush rump down on the couch, Sarah taking a chair in front of her. "Oh I always do love taking these visits out here, your home is always....quaint." The goth goddess chuckled, as if her last word didn't sound insulting at all.

"Yes..." Sarah replied slowly. "Can I get you anything to drink?"

"Why not make the bug get us something?" She pointed at you.

"...I would, but he's far too small to carry a glass anymore, thanks to you."

"Shame, he's so worthless." Rouge rolled her eyes, but smirked. "Well, not entirely. I do miss his foot massages."

"Yes, they are quite nice." Your goddess cupped her hand tighter around you, almost protectively. Was...Sarah being possessive over you? You had never felt defended before, even when you began to be less than a man to your goddesses.

"I also miss him cleaning my boots. Ugh, my maids and butlers just can't catch that tongue-licked sheen that he's capable of."

"...He licks and cleans my footwear too."

"Oh, the pair of heels and sneakers you own?"

"...I have more than just those."

"Not from what I see you wear." Rouge laughed. "Kidding dear, I'm just kidding! You have a lovely wardrobe. Not as extensive as mine, but still, quaint nonetheless."

"...I have to make a phone call." Sarah replied through gritted teeth. You could almost just feel the anger seething off of her, and hoped she wouldn't take it out on you later on. Just as she was about to get up, your cousin-goddess motioned with a finger.

"Mind leaving the insect here dearie? I would so love to have some time with him." She giggled, batting her long eyelashes.

With a huff, Sarah threw you onto the chair and stormed off to another part of the house so she could cool off and make that 'phone call' of hers. Fortunately, the cushion of the chair was soft enough to counteract the force at which she threw you down, making you bounce comfortably until you were positioned directly in the center of the cushion.

As you rubbed your head from the fall, a few booming footsteps and a tall shadow looming over you made you look up, Rouge sneering down at you with her hands on her hips as she towered high above, higher than any building could be compared to.

"I've missed you Luke." She chuckled, addressing you by your name. You gulped, knowing this would probably be a very, very, very bad day.

Being left alone with her was like being left out in the middle of a jungle with raw meat slathered on, a definite 'DO NOT LET HAPPEN' plastered over the whole scenario. Rouge crouched down so that her face was directly before you, plump and purple lips curled into a smile. You had to admit, Rouge hadn't even aged a day, appearing almost even younger. No signs of wrinkles or sagging in sight on her skin, it was as if she was eternally locked in her prime years. Sure, I kind of get a thrill from dominating my servants, but nobody does it better than you, little man."

Every moment with the purple-clad woman before you made you more and more nervous at what she would do to you. Visions of torture entered your head, but she normally saved that for later.
