You had to admit, you were amazed by the sight. Rouge's feet were lovely, flawless even, and you have had the pleasure on working on them before. Looks like you were about to get another chance to do so.

"Come." She commanded. You complied, approaching even closer until your half-inch form was right before her feet, as closed as you could get without pressing yourself up against her. "Bow." Her voice boomed yet again, and you hit your knees, bowing before her mighty feet. High above she smirked at the sight of the small, insect-sized man that was you pretty much worshiping her.

"Kiss. Lick." Came her next set of booms. You sat up and leaned in close to one of her huge toes, the right big toe to be exact, and pressed your lips up to it, beginning to kiss it gently, adding licks in between smooches for her commands, your tongue now flavored with foot sweat. You continued this for about three minutes before Rouge interrupted you.

"Massage." To which you pressed your hands up against her toe now, beginning to rub as hard as you could. "No, full body." Rouge added with a slight 'tsk' in her voice. You then pressed your entire self into it, rubbing your whole body against her toe, essentially humping it as well, along with your kisses and licks. This went on much longer than before, ten minutes of it, making you quite sore and tired. Where had Sarah gone?

"Mmm, good little man, but just my big toe won't cut No, every toe, then, my soles." She laughed, making your heart sink. Just as she had said, you worked on each toe, starting with the ones on her right foot and running over to her left foot, each massive digit happy to see you worship it. She even had you work in-between some of her toes, cleaning out dirt and gunk with your hands and mouth.

This went on for an hour, and still no sign of your main goddess Sarah. You began to worry about her. She obviously was not making a phone call. You gulped, mind wandering to bad thoughts. Maybe something had happened to her? Despite being treated like an insect to her, you were still her husband and worried about her terribly.

"Hey," Rouge snapped, the loud boom shaking you from your thoughts. "You've done well, my little slave. My perfect toes have never looked so pristine." She wiggled them, purple painted toenails glistening in the light. "But still, my magnificent soles still deserve attention."

"Yes, my goddess." You sighed. "Which of your perfect soles do you wish for me to begin with?"

High above, the devil grinned. "Both." She stated simply. Her massive feet overturned to the side, both soles facing one another. With a sound comparable to a freight train rolling through, her feet moved forward until her soles acted as two fleshy walls on either side of you, closing in steadily. You yelped just as they overtook you, squishing them between them, lost in the darkness of her foot folds, nothing to breath but the stench of her feet and nothing to see but the foot flesh.

"Mmm, yes, squirm little man, it feels good." She mocked. "Now get to work, you know what would happen if you didn't do your job."

That was all the incentive you needed, going straight to rubbing, licking, massaging, the works as you moved between her soles, still firmly trapped, just working from your stuck position.
15522.title: Pleasing the Demon

choices: You shrink to roughly 1/8th of an inch tall
You shrink MUCH smaller than that
155221.content:
Your tongue moved over the wrinkles of her foot, licking up any lint, dirt, or whatever Rouge had collected on her bare soles. Your hands moved over her soft and supple skin, and your body squirmed just for the pleasure of it. You would be lying if you said you didn't enjoy it. Some of your tasks were demeaning, like this one, but you had come to love them, even if it was for this demonic woman who had you literally at her feet, trapped tween two soles comparable to buildings.

As you worked, slowly Rouge began to grind her soles back and forth, rolling you around between them like the tiny toy you were. The motion was pleasing to her, getting a full foot massage from her tiny half-inch toy, but to you it was painful. Your bones creaked and your body strained as you were rolled twixt the fleshy walls, gathering up dirt and sweat onto yourself, face smushed into her foot as you struggled to breath fresh air beyond the scent of her feet. Of course, there was no escaping it, since you were simply surrounded by them.

This went on for another half hour, Rouge moaning overhead, relishing the power and pleasure she got from having you love her feet and grinding you between them. "Mmm, this has been so wonderful." Rouge laughed above. "You just just what to do, you little bug."

"T-thank you." You called up, adding another lick, tongue pretty much numb by this point, so you didn't taste anything but feet.

"...Thank you, what?" Rouge asked, giving her feet a small squeeze to your body. Though it wasn't that much pressure, to your miniscule form it was incredibly painful, forcing you to cringe and grit your teeth as you found your chest compressing to having trouble breathing.

"Thank you..." You wheezed. "My goddess..."

"Good little slave!" Rouge replied happily, clapping her hands, releasing the pressure she held on you, making you gasp for air. "Now get back to work." She commanded once again as she noticed that you had stopped momentarily. You sighed inwardly, and began to work through the pain, cringing as springs of pain shot through your arms and chest every time you moved.

"Do you know what I like about you, Luke?" Rouge said after a few more minutes of worship.

"What...what is it Goddess Rouge?" You asked through a mouthful of foot lint, forcing it down dryly.

"You're so loyal, so dependable. No matter what, you know just what to do for your goddess."

"Thank you...Goddess." You cringed, reminding yourself to add that last bit.

"Do you know what I want you to do now, Luke?" She continued to refer to you by your real name. That was almost never a good sign.

"No, my goddess...do you wish me to continue worshiping your perfect feet?"

"Yes, I do, but maybe later." She chuckled deeply. "I want you to get smaller now."

"..."

"I didn't hear a 'yes, goddess'." Rouge said threateningly, beginning to squeeze her soles together once more, forcing a pained shout from your lips.

"Y-yessss....my goddess...." You cried out just as you heard something snap and break from the continuous pressure being forced on you by Rouge's oncoming soles, soon pressing up against you so heavily her feet touched, your small form simply smished in between them, bones breaking and your body twisted in awkward, pained angles. You couldn't even move, being pressed so tightly on all sides. You eventually found that you couldn't breathe either, no air coming in, just the suffocating sheer stench of Rouge's feet filling your lungs.

With one final gasp and choke, you blacked out, and mentally prepared yourself to see the world larger than it already was, Rouge's laughter booming through the air, the only thing you could hear.
155221.title: Diminished

15523.content:
"Thing's just haven't been the same since you got married. Back when we were younger I could come see you whenever I wanted. Gosh, remember that time you stayed over at my house for four months?" Unfortunately you did. You didn't stay at Rouge's so much as you were kidnapped. Back then you had to have been around...a foot tall? By the time Sarah found you you were six inches tall and lucky to be that big. Every day for four months you crawled your way to each of Rouge's shoes and licked them clean, only to then have to crawl to her toes and properly pamper them. On a good day you got to eat crumbs from the bottoms on her feet. On most days you had to beg the Goddess for food and deal with the inevitable games and mockery that came with it. By the time Sarah finally saved you you were so happy you kissed her feet for a day straight.

"They were good times Goddess Rouge." You forced a smile, repressing all those horrid memories.

"Yeah they were. Though from what I hear you still put that tongue of yours to work eh?"

"Goddess Sarah needs her shoes cleaned every time. Just because I'm small doesn't mean I can't do my part." While she may have been rough on you Sarah was a perfect Goddess. She never did anything to you that you didn't already deserve.

"I couldn't agree more dear." Rouge smiled, "If nothing else Sarah taught you your place all right. Below me."

"Of course Goddess. I'm just a bug at your feet." Where was your Goddess Wife when you needed her? This was not looking good at all. If Sarah came through here at any point to save you you would happily spend the next month licking her feet with no breaks.

"Oh? At my feet you say? Then...why aren't you there now?" Rouge's deep laugh sent chills down your spine. "Come now bug boy. Come."

Instantly your body jerked to action and you began your descent down the chair. With good reason it seemed. The instant you weren't on the cushion Rouge quickly seated herself. If you hesitated for a moment her titanic butt would've crushed you. Her legs were directly behind you, impatiently crossing and uncrossing. All you could see in your peripheral was the familiar shade of white you'd come to know all too well in your life. Rouge's boots were the things of nightmares. Just glancing at the white mountains was enough to give you flashbacks of every previous time they'd come down to crush you. Regardless, you climbed down the floor and stood before the two boots, doing your best not to show fear.

"Come on has your wife taught you nothing Luke? Bow to your Goddess."

You lowered yourself on all fours and looked to the ground.

"You really do belong there." The Demon laughed. "I really have missed you bug. No one makes me feel as nice as you do. Then again I guess no one else makes me feel like an all powerful Goddess either!" She laughed again at her tasteless joke. Nervously you laughed too. "I actually had someone lick my boots clean this morning. Though compared to you it just wasn't that good unfortunately. Needless to say he's out on the streets. Now I'm in the market for a new boot slave." Rouge's eyes gained a mean glint, "So how bout it darling? For old time's sake?"

It wasn't a request and she knew it. Hiding your disgust you eagerly answered, "Of course Goddess Rouge!"

"If you have time to talk you have time to lick."

Still on all fours, you crawled to Rouge's left boot and began to lick. It wasn't a new action by any stretch. You lived to serve your Goddesses. Licking shoes clean was hardly anything anymore. On a semi-daily basis you licked all of Sarah's shoes clean. Once in a while you took care of your daughter's shoes. In fact, just about every Goddess you knew you licked their shoes clean at some point. It wasn't a big deal at all. But something about doing it for Goddess Rouge really irritated you. Perhaps it was the taste. You were more than accustomed to the taste of a worn sandal or a fairly recent sneaker, even the occasional heel, but Rouge's boots were unique. They were the kind of boots people who only bought high-class shoes would wear. They had a perpetual leathery taste that never seemed to go away and mixed with the years of exposure to Rouge's feet it wasn't a great combination.

You knew Rouge was eagerly watching you with each second too. One of her favorite past times was watching you worship her. It took hours upon hours to lick even a single boot to the Goddess's satisfaction but her gaze never left you once as you did it in all these years. It made you break out in a sweat just thinking about it. A single misstep and Rouge would seize it to do God know's what. As much as you relished the idea of getting crushed you honestly really liked your current height. Where the hell was Sarah?!

"Just like the good old days." Rough laughed. That deep, seductive laugh seemed to be the only one she had. It was a laugh that inspired fear and arousal at the same time. "You may have a career in this bug. I can make your family a very nice offer. Then we can spend all day together."

After hearing that you gagged, an act that did not go unnoticed.

"Did you really just gag at my boots?" You cursed at yourself under your breath. Rouge was so obviously trying to trigger a reaction out of you. You tried to keep licking and move on but the boot pulled back. "Such insolence from an ant." Rouge sounded far too delighted with the outcome. The black sole of her boot was inches away from you. "This boot could lower an inch right now and crush you into dust. Did you forget that?"

"N-No Goddess." You squeaked. How many times had this black sole been the death of you? You lost track. All you knew was seeing it freaked you out.

"Then please tell me why you gagged."

"I...I...." You scrambled for an answer, "I choked on its greatness my Goddess."

A chuckle left Rouge's plump lips, "Is that so? Then I suppose there's no problem then. Just apologize first."

"I'm sorry Goddess Rouge."

"Not to me silly. To my boots. You insulted them."

"Sorry oh holy boots. I was wrong to insult you like that."

"Good." Rouge snickered, "While you're down there go ahead and get the sole cleaned."

"Yes Goddess..." You went to work, whole body shaking from the sight of Rouge's boot sole. There was no doubt about it. Maybe half an hour of licking this sole and you'd be crushed again. It couldn't possibly not happen.

Guess I better get used to being even smaller. You mentally sighed.

Then a miracle happened.

"Excuse me, what is going on here?"

If Rouge was annoyed she hid it effortlessly. She looked over her shoulder to Sarah standing in the entryway. "Nothing much darling. While we waited our little bug here volunteered to clean my boots. It'd have been rude to refuse."

Sarah crossed her arms, "Somehow I don't think that's what happened." Of course she saw this coming. It didn't irritate her any less.

"Relax Sarah! Honestly you need to go out more often darling. You seem a wee bit tense."

Sarah forced a smile on her face and sat at the couch opposite Rouge. "I'm just tired I suppose. Haven't slept much lately."

"Oh I'm afraid I wouldn't know what that's like. On my nice luxurious bed I almost never wake up. I can't imagine sleeping on that rock you have. I kid of course!"

"Of course." Sarah replied through gritted teeth. Her eyes darted towards you, clearly angry. Her fingers snapped and pointed to the spot before her feet. Wordlessly you rushed to obey your Goddess of a wife. Anything to get away from Rouge.

You were barely halfway when she said it. "Where you going Luke? You didn't finish."

The words stopped you dead in your tracks. You turned and saw Rouge looking directly at you with her finger pointed at her boots.

"Get over here Luke." Goddess Sarah impatiently chirped in. You turned back and saw her finger pointing at her feet.

"Nonsense dear. Luke, come back here and finish licking your Goddess's boots. You can't leave a job half finished."

"Luke, get your ass over here and start licking my toes now." Sarah was fuming, though admittedly not without good reason. Each second with Rouge was like a second in hell.

There you stood, with two Goddesses on either end of you both ordering you to come worship their feet. You froze, unsure of what to do. On one hand Sarah was more than upset already and slighting her now would only prove bad for an undetermined amount of time. But on the other hand if you ignored Rouge...it wouldn't end well. You couldn't even imagine what that Demoness would do to you. Rouge always got her way.

You had to choose though. Do you rush to obey Sarah, or Rouge?
15523.title: Bootlicking for Old Time's Sake

choices: She arrives at her mansion and lays down the ground rules
Something stops her along the way
155232.content:
You gulped, fervently switching between gazing up at each goddess, sweating bullets as your mind tried to decide on which one you should run to. The decision was tearing you apart, truly it was. Run to the safety of your goddess wife and possibly lessen your punishment from her, or run to Rouge and soothe the woman who had almost all of the power in this situation?

Your eyes met Sarah's momentarily as you gazed up at her, and you could see the hint of malice in them. You sighed and mouthed up the words to her. "I'm sorry, Goddess Sarah..."

With that, you turned back around and ran towards Rouge's purple-clad form seated oh so neatly in the chair, smirking as she watched your tiny form scurry back towards her, Sarah watching with as much intent, her face nearly red with anger. As you approached walls of her boots, Rouge let out a snicker as she looked back up towards Sarah.

"Sorry dear, but I'm to know where little Luke's loyalties lie." She smirked. "I'd be happy to take him off your hands from you. A unloyal bug is worthless to you now, but worth plenty to me. I could pay you a fine penny for him."

Wait...what?! You were only planning on finishing your lick job of the bottom of Rouge's boot to satisfy her so that you could get back to Sarah as quickly as possible. You looked across the long distance to your wife, her cold glare never leaving you. You shuddered from under it, never having felt such hate radiate off of a person before now. You truly felt sorry, and wanted to make it up to her, but telling by the way the situation was going, you could not reason with your goddess.

"..." Sarah paused as she contemplated Rouge's words. "...What are you offering?" She asked, making your jaw drop. You had always been loyal up to this point, and had always wanted to strive for and please her to the best of your abilities. This was only a slight mistake, one you regretted. Didn't she at least love you? You had thought she held a tiny bit of compassion for her little slave, as you loved and worshiped her, as well as your goddess-daughters. You gulped, knowing this would not end well.

"More than enough money to make up for the fact that this little ant betrayed you." Rouge's words flowed smoothly together in that deep, lustful tone of hers. She was a smooth dealer no doubt, and you could only imagine how business deals went with her. She could probably get even the most stingiest of businessmen to part with their cash to her gladly.

"Anything else?" Sarah began to tap her foot, creating light booms even felt by you from this distance away.

"I'll stop dropping by for visits." Rouge smirked knowingly. The only reason she ever came was for you, and now that she almost had you in her possession, why waste her time gracing this little hovel with her presence anymore?

"Deal. The insect is yours." Sarah replied coldly, arms crossed. "I want you and it out of my house now." She demanded.

Ouch...she called you an 'it'. It was always slave, or bug, but never it. That stung deep, and you paled at the fact that...Rouge now owned you, the horror settling upon you with a wretched and heavy weight. The she-devil laughed, boot sole still hovering over you. "Oh, we will leave, but right after he finishes licking and cleaning the bottom of my boot."

"....Fine." She huffed in reply, turning around and stomping up the stairs.

"You hear that, Luke?" Rouge cackled high above. "You'll be heading home with me! Oh, I know you just can't wait to get to my mansion. We're going to have so much fun together..." She cooed, but with the most evil of intent lacing her words with poison. You shuddered as your tongue went up and began to clean the treads of her boots, picking off dirt and whatever else Rouge had stepped on.

Your work was slow, not that Rouge didn't seem to mind now. Normally she'd command you to work faster or better, but now she seemed...content. She could work you as fast or as slow as she liked now, there was no time limit now. She could do whatever she wished without restraint to you now that you were literally her pet, her slave, her bug. No longer Sarah's or anybody else's.

You...answered to Rouge alone, and that once again made you shiver coldly in terror.

After roughly ten more minutes of licking her boot, she seemed satisfied, massive hand looming over you before plucking you right off the ground and pinching you tightly tween her long fingernails, threatening to cut off circulation to various parts of your body and even dismember you if she squeezed a bit tighter. Before you was her large eye, long eyelashes batting and creating a gust of wind that blew in your direction.

"We're going to have so much fun! And to think I only had to pay a small trifle of my money just to get you in my pocket. Money really does buy happiness." She smirked. "Now, don't worry little man, I'll be the best goddess you've ever had, even moreso than that little prat Sarah." Rouge went on, standing up from the seat and heading to the door. "All you have to do is dedicate every waking moment of the rest of your life to worshiping me. Even in your sleep, I want to dream about me. I want you to live and breathe off of my name, filling your every action and thought...Rouge." She laughed almost in a mad way, cackling as she stepped outside, calling her driver.

She approached her long white limousine, a butler opening the door for her as she got in. "To home, Charles." She commanded. A few seconds later and the sound of an engine going on, you were off to your new life.

"Oh, don't worry, life with me will be wonderful." Rouge smirked, leaning back in her leather seat, crossing her legs as she still had you pinched between her fingers. "I'll give the best of accommodations. You'll get to live inside of my boots, eat my crumbs and drink my sweat. What more could anyone ask for?"

"It...it will be wonderful, g-goddess Rouge." You forced out your first words since becoming her own personal slave.

"Indeed it will." The demon smiled before lowering her hand, your vision now replaced with the long line of her luscious cleavage. With a flick of her fingers, your small form was sent shooting towards her chest, landing deeply between her massive breasts, wedged tightly between the soft and pale fleshy walls surrounding you on all sides.

"Here's a little treat for you, slave." Rouge laughed high above, her booming voice muffled a bit through the boob-flesh. "Just a tease on the ride home. Get to massaging, little man, unless you want to see these mountains," She cupped her breasts in hand, slowly squeezing them together. "As continents." She threatened. You began to rub all around you with all of your might, satisfying her enough not to crush you, a small moan escaping her lips.

"Good." Rouge cooed.
155232.title: To Rouge

choices: A maid interrupts her and says Rouge has guests
Rouge does crush you, time to shrink...
1552321.content:
From within your cleavage prison, everything was darkened and muffled as you perpetually rubbed the soft walls holding you between them. The occasional bump in the road the limousine hit sent a jiggle through Rouge's extra-large chest, forcing you to smack your face directly into whatever breast you were facing at the time. "Yes, my little slave, you may kiss your goddess's chest." Rouge giggled from high above, mistaking the accident as worship to her. You had to say, out of every goddess you had served, Rouge was the most sadistic, evil, megalomaniacal, and egotistical.

Eventually you could feel the hum of the vehicle come to a stop, the sound of shuffling feet and a door being opened. "We have arrived, madam Rouge." Came a male voice, no doubt her driver.

"Thank you Charles. Bring the limo round back with the others, and tell the staff to drop everything they're doing and meet me in the foyer, we're having a meeting." Rouge said, stepping out, making you squint as sunlight fell on her cleavage. She began walking, every step a shaking jiggle, or more like a boobquake to you as you were plastered up against the inner sides of her abundant cleavage.

Once inside her mansion, Rouge smirked at the thirty or so employees of hers. Mentally she called them slaves, even though they were paid servants. About ten maids, five chefs, five butlers, and ten security guards, all paid to tend to her every whim and word.

"Greetings everyone. Besides myself, we're going to have another...guest live in my humble abode."

A roar of murmuring voices went around the group, some thinking Rouge had caught another man in her claws and was going to suck him dry. Well, they were partially right.

"Quiet." She said simply, and all whispering ceased. Her fingers dug around in her cleavage until she pulled you out, holding you up for all of them to see. Some squinted their eyes, thinking you were just an ant and that Rouge had gone over the deep end (you think she did that a long time ago), while some stared in silence as they realized what you were.

"As some of you know of the story, a few years ago, my poor cousin Luke was stricken with an incurable condition, one that whenever he suffered too much physical trauma, his body would begin to diminish. Sadly, over the years, that horrible wife of his mistreated him to the point at what he is now, broken and half an inch tall." She fake-sobbed. You could just hear the artificial tears flowing down her face.

"So today I rescued him from that horrible woman, and have made it a point to him living here with me. He'll be staying in my quarters, and I do enunciate on this part, none of you are to come in contact with him." She warned threateningly. There went your only chance of being rescued, knowing how loyal or terrified of Rouge her employees were. "He's had too much trauma over his life." Her voice softened once again. "And only I may tend to him."

After a few more false whimpers to add to her mock-story Rouge glared at all of them. "What are you all waiting for? Get back to work or I'll have your asses shipped out of here so hard." She threatened, the foyer clearing almost instantly.

"Good. Glad we have an understanding." The demon chuckled, beginning to head up the steps to her room, no doubt lavished with the most expensive of tastes and furnishings. Once inside, she closed the door and locked it so that she could have private time with her little slave. You were tossed onto her bed, and guess what, met a purple blanket as you crashed into it. Surprisingly, no pain at all, not even a little rough bouncing. Rouge was right, this thing was soft.

Her shadow loomed overhead as she strutted over to you, smirking downwards.

"Aww, finally, alone at last my little slave." She purred, lowering her hand, walking her fingers along the bed towards you, her pillar-like fingers threatening to slam down onto you, but you knew to remain still, lest it displeased the goddess.

"I wonder what to do with you first?" She mused, lightly flicking you and knocking you down onto your back, pinning you with the tip of her nail. "I do have a few things in mind, but I just don't know, they're all so much fun for both of us. I could have you clean every boot and shoe and heel in my wardrobe, all three-hundred pairs." She cackled. "Or I could toss you into a salad and make you a little snack, see what happens there. Wonder if your condition makes you immune to stomach acid."

"My perfect butt could use some worship...or my feet, or any divine part of my form. So. Many. Choices!" Rouge giggled, adding a bit of pressure to her finger, making you gasp for air.

"Or...I could make you smaller." She contemplated almost boredly, as if killing you was such a mundane task.
1552321.title: Home of the Devil

choices: "Sorry to say. A Deal's a Deal. He's mine forever."
15523211.content:
"It would only take a single finger." Rouge mumbled, hovering her pointer finger over you. "Maybe not even that. I could just blow and you'd fall off the bed and die like that. So many options..." Rouge sighed as if she didn't know what to do with herself. "Ah well. We'll have plenty of time to test out all my lovely ideas. Isn't that right my little slave?" You winced as Rouge's long violet nail came for your neck, stopping just short and rubbing your chin. It didn't calm you down any though. This one nail could be your guillotine any second now.

"Y-Yes Goddess Rouge." You choked out an answer.

"Welcome home tiny. It's going to be so much fun for the both of u-"

A voice on an intercom cut the woman off. "Excuse me, Mistress?"

Rouge's face never looked so angry before. With a cold expression she pushed a button to reply. "What?" It was easily the scariest way that word had ever been uttered.

The maid on the other end seemed to pick up on this quick. A small "Eep" could be heard across the line. When she finally worked up the courage to respond her voice was wavering, "I'm s-sorry Mistress but you have company. A....Sarah? She says she's here for her husband." You cheered as loudly as you could inside. Just when you'd given up all hope your wife comes to save the day! Man that woman is great. The sooner she could get you the sooner you could get away from this she-demon.

Rouge looked mildly surprised, "Please tell her we had a deal."

There was a moment of silence. "She says she wants to talk to you in person."

"I'm dreadfully sorry dear, but I'm afraid I'm busy welcoming our new house guest."

There was another bit of silence as the maid relayed the message. From the intercom you could clearly hear the sounds of objects breaking and a woman cursing. "Uhh...She's really insisting Mistress." The maid sounded frightened.

The Goddess before you let out an exaggerated moan, "Fine, I'll come down there."

"Yes Mam!"

"Also...What is your name dear?"

"Emily...?"

"Well Emily, when I get down there I want you out of this house. You're fired." Rouge released the button without letting the woman reply. She turned back to you with a weary smile. "Well let's get going then. The last thing I need is your dear old wifey breaking half my things. Most of them are worth more than your house." A deep laugh plagued your ear drums as familiar tower-sized fingers plucked you from the bed. You found yourself quickly shoved back into the woman's immense cleavage. "You know what to do." You started to massage and kiss her bosom.

It felt like the walk back to the guest area took a lot longer than it should have. Fabulously wealthy or not it shouldn't take this long. Knowing Rouge she was probably intentionally stalling you figured. Each second that passed was a second you worshiped her and a second she didn't have to deal with Sarah. She couldn't put it off forever though. Once she and Sarah get to talking you're home free! With that light at the end of the tunnel you put all your heart into worshiping Rouge. Each kiss was like a kiss goodbye. You just might stay your current size after all.

When she finally entered the guest room it was pretty clear. The air grew chillingly tense and every sound seemed to echo painfully loud. The booming clacks of Rouge's heels were all you could hear until she seated her voluptuous figure on her favorite chair: an imported, tailor-made throne. From the woman's cleavage you could see Sarah seated across on a very nice, but nowhere nice as Rouge's, seat. She seemed considerably calmer than earlier, though still pretty fuming.

"To what do I owe the pleasure dear?" Rouge asked in a cold polite manner.

"I came to get my husband." Sarah replied in an equally cold polite tone.

"I'm sorry darling, but we had a deal. What we in the finer life like to call: a verbal contract."

"I don't care about that I just want him back."

"And why is that? An hour ago you said and I quote, 'I want you and It out of my house'. You looked about ready to crush poor old Luke into dust a hundred times over, and who can blame you? He picked me over you, his wife. You have every right to hate his guts forever. So why the sudden change?"

"I...let my temper get the better of me. I wasn't thinking clearly." Sarah admitted with an embarrassed look.

"So it would seem." Rouge pursed her lips, "Unfortunately a deal is a deal though. I can't just go back on my word. Why, I'd be some kind of monster if I did that now wouldn't I?" You wanted to laugh as loudly as you could at that.

"Then I'll just take him back."

"Go ahead and try dear." Rouge waved a hand and several burly men appeared behind her. "Lest you forget I have all the muscle money can buy- And the attorney's if you wanna try court next."

Sarah bit her lip. You wanted nothing else but to reach out to her and be swept away from all this but it looked futile. Rouge had all the money and leverage here. Even with your wife mere inches away from you she was unobtainable. Rouge smiled as if to say she'd won. Whereas Sarah had a defeated look in her eyes.

"Look, I sympathize with you. Really I do Sarah. I actually do like you a lot."

"Is that so?" Sarah made a face that said she didn't believe that a bit.

She nearly hissed, anger strongly evident in every syllable spoken from her lips.

Of course, you had no real answer. You stuttered out some gibberish and fiddled with your hands, trying to form a coherent thought and force it into words. What could you say? That you feared Rouge more than her? That you worried that she would deliver a punishment far worse than any other you had received beforehand? No, none of those explanations could help your situation. With a downcast look, you sighed.

"I'm...I'm sorry my goddess." You said sadly, biting your lip sd you looked down and examined the lines of her palm. "I did not know what I was thinking at the time...but I truly do love you more than goddess Rouge...I do."

"When you are around me, you are to refer to her as just Rouge. Or bitch." Sarah said through grinding teeth, but her tone seemed to lessen a bit from angry after hearing your apology.

"Yes, goddess Sarah." You nodded, but gulped, hoping Rouge wouldn't hear that. The click-clack and thud of her boots on the tiled floor announced that the purple-clad woman was returning.

"Sarah darling!" Rouge chuckled as she entered the room, followed behind by her squad of muscle-men. "Everything's all set, if you'll just follow me, when can begin the procedure."

You looked up cautiously to your wife, eyebrow raised. "...Procedure?" You looked around, still carried protectively in Sarah's hands, and you caught Rouge glancing over at you every once in a while, smirking down at you when the two of you made eye contact. Eventually the area darkened as Sarah and Rouge went down a flight of stairs, descending them quickly. The stairway was dimly lit by dying lightbulbs, bathing everything in a orange and yellow eerie glow. You got a bad feeling about all of this, but did not feel like being vocal about it. Years of subjugation and torture had made you quite subservient and meek enough not to voice your opinion.

Dozens of men and women in white lab coats ran about, some muttering to themselves, others furiously scribbling onto clipboards. Large machines overhead buzzed and hummed almost ominously.

Against everything in your will you fought yourself just to turn your own head to look back and see what was happening. What you saw made your heart drop and your breath stop.

High, high above, Rouge's perfectly round ass was slowly descending upon you, almost like the moon itself coming down to slam earthside. You stopped and sighed, knowing it would be futile to try and run anymore. Gasping for air, there was absolutely no chance to even avoid something that massive, that astronomical. It was like a armageddon meteor, aimed specifically at you.

Closer and closer her rear came, obscuring more and more of your vision with nothing but pale white ass flesh for countless miles. You gulped. Only a few seconds away from impact. Closing your eyes, you prepared yourself.

The next instant, a billion tons of jiggling right cheek slammed down atop of you, followed by Rogue's godly cackling that rang through the air.
155232122.title: You try to make a run for it...

info.brief_description: You were born unable to die, but at the cost of your size.
info.description:
When you were born an anomaly occured and you technically died after only a few moments. However instead of dying hours later you were found alive once more, only a fifth of your size when born. Doctors were baffled for years, but eventually you and your family have managed to figure out the details of your "condition"

--------------

No matter what the circumstances you cannot die. If you go through an ordeal where you would die instead of dying you pass out and shrink, ranging from a couple inches to almost all of your height at the time depending on how severe the death was. It's been an interesting life to say the least. Today you live with your all female family...

----------------

EDIT:
Instead of that insanely long list of characters. Here's a link to a document with all of them on there in more detail. http://www.writing.com/main/view_item/item_id/1770605-Cheating-Death-Character-L...


Same rules as with my other interactives.
-No toilet stuff
-only Female giants.
-No short adds unless choice chapters.
- I'd prefer to keep people in character unless something happens.
-Normal-Sized, microscopic, size doesn't matter here. You can turn this into a story about a guy who's scared of dying, or a guy puny as a pebble. Up to you!

You can create your own characters but describe them!! You can build on the characters listed but keep it within reason.

Please add and if you have any questions feel free to ask ^^

Update: Over 200 hundred chapters and 25,000 views!! Thanks a lot to all those who have added and/or read this story and to those who will help in the future!
